text.64:
"Ideali Vichy" għall-għajnejn: klijent reviżjonijiet. "ideali Vichy" Kif effettiva krema għall-ġilda madwar l-għajnejn? 

wiċċ frisk, il-perċezzjoni estetika tiegħu hija dipendenti fuq l-istat taż-żona madwar l-għajnejn. Illum, aħna żviluppa varjetà ta 'prodotti kosmetiċi, li jippermetti li jorganizzaw il-kura sħiħa ta' dan il-qasam. L-aktar popolari huwa l-droga innovattivi mill-marka "Vichy", parti mill- "ideali" tas-serje. Il-firxa ta 'fondi hija mfassla għal dawk in-nisa li jintuża biex jieħdu ħsieb tagħhom infushom, iżda mhux lesti li jqattgħu ħafna ħin. 

deskrizzjoni 

Dawn li ġejjin huma karatteristiċi ewlenin ta 'krema maħsuba għall-kura taż-żona madwar l-għajnejn. 

tip tal-ġilda, l-età 

Skond il-manifattur, il-fluwidu-krema "Vichy ideali" adattati għall-etajiet kollha u kull tipi tal-ġilda. Il-funzjonijiet ewlenin ta 'flus huma fil-pitch allinjament u mikro-eżenzjoni, il-ġlieda kontra manifestazzjonijiet ta' stress u għejja, smoothing tikmix u t-tnaqqis pigmentazzjoni. Bħala riżultat, il-ġilda ssir radjanti, fade ċrieki skur u irritazzjoni. 

Eye Krema tellgħu l hypoallergenic, li huwa importanti għan-nisa mal-ġilda sensittiva suxxettibbli għall-irritazzjoni. Il-prodott fih ilma termali, li huwa ġentili fuq l-epidermide, moisturizes u tneħħi sinjali ta 'għeja. Krema mingħajr parabens. 

Fin-nisa, mezz ta 'serje ta' reazzjonijiet għajn "ideali Vichy" kienu kif ġej: 

krema mhuwiex adattat għall-ġilda xotta, minħabba li għandha idratazzjoni insuffiċjenti. Huwa konvenjenti għall-użu matul il-ġurnata, meta dawn jibdew sinjali ta 'għejja manifest, iżda mhux aktar. 

Fir-rigward ġilda sensittiva tfisser "ideali Vichy" wera li sorprendentement tajba. Hija ma tikkawżax xi irritazzjoni, ħmura, u problemi oħra. Għamla wara l-applikazzjoni taqa mingħajr xkiel mingħajr żliq. 

komponenti innovattivi 

Fil-kompożizzjoni rappreżentata permezz ta 'komponenti attivi. Dan polifenoli, vitamini, Ah, jittrasforma l-ġilda, jum wara jum, li ppruvat dermatologically ttestjati. Radjanza jipprovdi DRM kumplessi, u l-kaffeina tgħin biex ton-epidermis. 

mezzi Effiċjenza hija pprovduta kif ġej: 

Kaffeina - jelimina basktijiet, inaqqas nefħa, għandu effett sedattiv. kontorn għajn isir aktar espressiva. 

DRM bright-kumpless jipprovdi radjanza jagħmel il-ġilda eħfef. 

Wara l-applikazzjoni tal-fluwidu ma jkunx immedjatament assorbita. Jekk inti żżomm idejn taħt għajnejn tiegħu, huwa kien se ċapep. Għamla huwa aħjar li jitqiegħdu fil-15 minuta wara l-użu, inkella jista 'jirriżulta suċċess. 

Il-kompożizzjoni tal-fondi "Vichy ideali" għajn huwa uniku. L-ebda marka ma joffrix dawn kremi għaż-żona madwar l-għajnejn. 

X'jista 'jinkiseb 

Il-manifattur ssostni li ghandek tistenna r-riżultati li ġejjin wara l-ewwel xahar tas-krema: 

twittija-ġilda, il-microrelief; 

ħmura jisparixxu proċess pigmentazzjoni stabilizzata; 

Fluwidu jippermettilek li tikseb riżultati kbira fuq iż-żgħażagħ u l-ġilda aktar maturi (minn 20 sa 45 sena), iżda aktar tard fil-ħajja jista 'jintuża biss bħala kura addizzjonali. 

Il-krema tagħti t-trasformazzjoni ottika wara l-ewwel applikazzjoni - daqqa t'għajn jidher frisk u radjanti. Barra minn hekk, il-tikmix żgħar huma allinjati, iżda l-twittija ta 'formazzjonijiet aktar profonda, madankollu. "Ideali Vichy" għall-għajnejn, il-prezz huwa pjuttost għoli, jistgħu jintużaw sa 35 sena, imbagħad inti għandek bżonn kura aktar tessut. 

Kif għandek tuża 

Il-krema hija applikata għall-ġilda mnaddfa fil-għodu u filgħaxija. żona ta 'impatt jestendi mill-imnieħer għall-tempji. Il-ġilda hija saff lixxa u irqiq minn applikatur speċjali. kura sħiħa possibbli b'dawl tapping ma 'subgħajk. 

Jekk inti qosor xi riżultati, inti tista 'tindika liema huwa l-krema "Vichy ideali" tweġibiet għajn fin-nisa li huma mdorrijin jużaw kożmetiċi premium: 

Krema huwa istantanjament assorbiti, li jħallu l-ebda żejtni, tacky. tikmix multa huma mwittija out, u l-akbar isiru inqas prominenti. Għal applikazzjoni waħda ta 'ammont żgħir huwa meħtieġ, u għalhekk
text.65:
Parteċipazzjoni f'Doorslammers għal Rosello Cassar u Paul Fenech 

Intemmet l-avventura għas-sewwieqa Maltin Rosello Cassar u Paul Fenech f'Santa Pod fl-Ingilterra fl-avveniment Doorslammers. L-esperjenza għaż-żewġ sewwieqa kienet aktar ta' suċċess għal Rosello Cassar. 

Hu spiċċa mal-ewwel 16-il karozza mis-57 li kkompetew. Cassar ġie eliminat biss qabel il-kwarti tal-finali u wara li għadda mill-eliminazzjonijiet kollha u l-ewwel żewġ rawnds, tilef kontra Nic Williams b'differenza ta' 0.08 ta' sekonda. Nic Williams spiċċa rebbieħ tal-klassi. 

Paul Fenech saq l-Escort ta' Andy Harris u deher li kollox beda tajjeb għaliex irnexxielhom inaqsu l-ħin minn 10.7 sekondi għal 10.4 ta' sekonda. Meta deher li kien kollox lest għall-ewwel eliminazzjoni, żviluppat ħsara teknika fis-sistema elettrika tal-karozza. Dan wassal biex Fenech kien eliminat minħabba li ma laħaqx ħareġ għat-tellieqa. 

Il-karozza tal-Ingliż Andy Harris mistennija terġa' tiġi lura Malta għat-tielet rawnd tal-kampjonat tal-kwart ta' mil f'Ħal Far.
text.66:
Kultura komuni ħafna, li ħafna drabi tidher fuq it-tabelli tagħna, hija insalata tal-weraq. Fis-sajf, huwa mkabbar fuq plottijiet, f'ġonna tal-ħxejjex, fi rziezet speċjalizzati, iżda fix-xitwa huwa frekwenter ta 'ħwienet tal-ħxejjex. Naturalment, il-ħass huwa aktar popolari minħabba l-valuri nutrittivi tiegħu u r-rikkezza tal-kompożizzjoni kimika. 

Fil-meraq tal-ħass fih numru kbir ta 'dawk l-aktar meħtieġa u utli għas-sustanzi tal-bniedem. Iżda wkoll għandha ħafna kwalitajiet ta 'fejqan, per eżempju, il-ġbir ta' ħut b'suċċess jimxi mal-manteniment tas-saħħa u saħansitra jgħin biex jeħles mill-mard diġà eżistenti, jippreserva sbuħija u jtawwal iż-żgħażagħ. 

Jekk mbuttat frisk, allura hemm ammont kbir ta 'vitamini, sustanzi organiċi ta' melħ minerali. Iżda dawn il-kwalitajiet kollha jiddependu fuq il-kondizzjonijiet li taħthom tiżdied l-insalata. Iz-zokkor naturali u l-aċidi organiċi, bħalma huma l-lumi, it-tuffieħ, l-ossaliku u l-ambra, f'dan l-impjant mhumiex ħafna, fi kwalunkwe każ inqas minn f'rappreżentanti oħra ta 'din l-ispeċi. Minerali rappreżentati fiha: potassju (aktar, chemostalnyh), kalċju, fosfru, silikon, manjeżju, kubrit, ħadid u sodju. Vitamini huma wkoll abbundanti fil-vitamini, huma vitamini tal-grupp sħiħ B, C, PP, E, H, K u karotên. 

Jekk anke l-persentaġġ ta 'ħadid fil-ħass u insinifikanti, iżda bl-użu tal-meraq tiegħu, huwa possibbli li tappoġġja perfettament il-funzjoni ematopojetika normali. Il-ħadid fl-organiżmu tagħna, bħala element attiv ħafna li jakkumula fil-milsa tal-fwied, qiegħed dejjem jiġi aġġornat. Jekk persuna tbiddel id-dieta tiegħu jew ikollha telf ta 'demm, allura meta l-ħadid fil-ġisem jonqos, huwa, meta jkun orga akkumulat, jintuża biex jifforma stokk ġdid ta' demm (ċelloli tad-demm). 

Vlatate-letucha ħafna kalċju u manjeżju, li mingħajrhom il-fibra tal-muskoli ma tistax taħdem b'mod normali, hemm ksur fis-sistema nervuża ċentrali, l-istruttura ċellulari u tat-tessut tiddeterjora. 

Il-korp enormi u r-rwol tal-kalċju, li huwa l-komponent ewlieni tat-tessut tal-għadam, l-enamel tas-snien, jappoġġja l-funzjonijiet vitali normali taċ-ċelloli, il-kompożizzjoni u l-fluwidu fit-tessuti. L-attività tal-biċċa l-kbira tal-enzimi mingħajr kalċju hija sempliċement impossibbli, kif ukoll it-trażmissjoni tal-impulsi tas-sistema nervuża. L-aħjar kombinazzjoni, li fiha l-kalċju u l-manjeżju huma l-ġirien, tgħinek minn ħafna problemi ta 'saħħa. 

Il-komponenti taċ-ċelluli tal-moħħ huma fosfru, u l-kubrit huwa preżenti fl-emoglobina. Żewġ minn dawn l-elementi, li huma parti mill-sod, li jinkludi wkoll silikon, se jappoġġjaw il-ġilda fi stat normali, jaffettwaw it-tkabbir tax-xagħar. L-għenieqed u l-għeruq se jkunu ħafna aktar elastiċi. 

Jekk tgħaqqad il-meraq tal-ħass ma 'meraq tal-karrotta, allura dan il-cocktail ikun utli biex tixrob anki lit-tarbija, se tipprovdi għajnuna effettiva fit-tkabbir normali u l-iżvilupp tat-tarbija. 

Attrazzjoni ta 'ċistite, diskinesija, ulċeri fl-istonku u ulċeri duwodenali se jkollha effett benefiku tal-komposti alkalojdi ta' hyoscyamine, li huma parti mill-coccatalate-letuka. Effett analġesiku u serħan il-moħħ, dan il-meraq huwa obbligat għall-hyoscyamine. 

Il-meraq mbuttat minn dan l-impjant, li huwa sors ta 'sustanzi bħal karotên, vitamina C, bijotina hija vitamina ta' sbuħija, huwa indispensabbli għall-proċess ta 'sustanzi metaboliċi, għal ematopoiesi - dan kollu jiżgura l-kapaċità normali u sana tas-sistema nervuża. Dan huwa ta 'importanza kbira għat-tfal u għall-ommijiet futuri. 

Persuni morda bit-tuberkolożi u l-qtar, ibatu minn mard tal-passaġġ gastro-intestinali, huwa sempliċiment meħtieġ li tieħu meraq tal-ħass. Jekk ikun hemm problemi fis-sistema kardjovaskulari (anġina pectoris, mard tal-qalb iskemiku), il-meraq għandu effett paċifiku - għandu jittieħed dakinhar tal-vjaġġ għal ħmistax-il qatra, iżda bil-kondizzjoni li l-meraq ikun mbuttat mill-ġdid. 

Rihytrazvivaetsya minħabba nuqqas ta 'kalċju fil-ġisem u xi minerali. Is-sistema tal-għadam hija mrattab u deformat - f'dan
text.67:
Ħamsterż fl-adulti 

Il-ħosba tal-ħosba hija assoċjata ma 'mard tat-tfulija, iżda din il-marda hija komuni fost l-adulti. Il-ħati tiegħu huwa infezzjoni virali akuta, jiġifieri, tista 'tinqered wara li tkellem lil xi ħadd li diġà huwa morda bil-ħosba. Is-salvataġġ minn problemi bħal dawn, madankollu, jista 'jiġi mlaqqam. 

Sintomi ta 'ħosba fl-adulti 

Ladarba jintemm il-perjodu ta 'inkubazzjoni, u jista' jdum minn 1 sa 4 ġimgħat skont l-immunità, il-marda tidher sewwa. L-ewwel, hemm telqa, nodi linfatiċi jiżdiedu, żieda għolja fid-deni , ir-ras tibda tinqala ', u l-pazjent għandu biss ħolm ta' rqad kwiet. Barra minn hekk, ta 'spiss għall-bqija kollha jiżdiedu korija qawwija, sogħla niexfa, konġuntivite purulenta tista' tidher. Xi sinjali ta 'infezzjoni fl-adulti mhumiex meqjusa biċ-ċar bħala s-sintomi ta' ħosba fit-tfal , per eżempju, m'hemm l-ebda puplesija tat-trabi u granularità tal-kanal. Iżda anki mingħajr dan, il-pazjent għandu żmien diffiċli. 

F'din il-kundizzjoni, persuna morda tibqa 'għal 4-5 ijiem, u warajh il-kondizzjoni ttejjeb, iżda mhux għal żmien twil. Wara 1-2 ijiem, tidher darb'oħra temperatura għolja u tikek fuq in-naħa ta 'ġewwa tal-ħaddejn, simili għall-porridge tas-semolina li twaħħal. Dawn l-ewwel u l-aktar sinjali importanti ta 'ħosba fl-adulti jistgħu jippersistu sa l-irkupru. 

Bħala manifestazzjonijiet oħra ta 'ħosba fl-adulti, probabbilment kulħadd jaf - hemm eruzzjonijiet wara l-widnejn, fuq ir-ras, l-għonq, li kull jum aktar u aktar jirbħu t-territorju tal-ġisem tal-pazjent. Matul dan il-perjodu, is-sintomi kollha tal-ħosba jsiru agħar. 

Wara dak kollu li ġie ttrasferit, il-pazjent jilqa 'b'sodisfazzjon perjodu ta' pigmentazzjoni, meta l-kundizzjoni hija normalizzata, u ħafna sinjali tal-marda jisparixxu. Eruptions jisparixxu fi żmien ġimgħa. 

Profilassi tal-ħosba fl-adulti 

B'mod inekwivoku, l-aktar mod importanti ta 'prevenzjoni huwa t-tilqim. It-tilqim ta 'adulti kontra l-ħosba huwa meħtieġ, iżda huwa aħjar jekk il-vaċċin isir fit-tfulija - f'sena waħda, u għal 6 snin. Imma jekk din il-proċedura ma titwettaqx fil-ħin, m'hemm l-ebda raġuni għad-diżordni. It-tilqim tal-ħosba fl-adulti jitwettaq ukoll f'żewġ stadji b'waqfa ta 'tliet xhur. Il-vaċċin għal din il-marda jiġi amministrat flimkien mal-vaċċin kontra l-gattone, ir-rubella u l-ġidri tat-tiġieġ. Ipproteġi ruħek mill-marda fi kwalunkwe età u kull persuna sensibbli għandha tifhem l-importanza ta 'dan l-avveniment. Sabiex tkun infermiera, għandek tikkuntattja lit-tabib lokali tiegħek li se jagħti direzzjonijiet u rakkomandazzjonijiet. 

Trattament ta 'ħosba fl-adulti 

Jekk il-marda ma tiżviluppax f'forma kumplessa, allura hija ttrattata d-dar. Mistrieħ tas-sodda indikat, konsum ta 'ammonti kbar ta' likwidu, teħid ta 'vitamina A, kura bir-reqqa ta' l-għajnejn u l-imnieħer. L-antibijotiċi huma preskritti biss f'każijiet severi, il-bqija huma sintomatiċi u anti-istaminiċi. Il-ħosba tal-ħosba jista 'jikkawża kumplikazzjonijiet, għalhekk it-trattament m'għandux jittardja. 

Iżda huwa aħjar li tiġi evitata l-marda, tk. huwa kapaċi jagħti kumplikazzjonijiet. Speċjalment huwa karatteristiku għall-ħosba fl-adulti. Il-marda f'xi każijiet twassal għal telf tas-smigħ, il-vista, il-kliewi u l-ħsara fil-fwied, pnewmonja, enċefalite. Ħjut tal-ħosba in-nisa tqal iwasslu għat-telf tal-fetu. Kull sena, ħafna mwiet huma rreġistrati, iżda dawn huma l-aktar mard injorat jew iseħħu f'forma kkumplikata ħafna fl-isfond ta 'immunità mdgħajfa. 

Wara t-trasferiment tal-marda, il-memorja tibqa 'għall-ħajja u l-aktar ħaġa importanti hija li l-immunità tul il-ħajja hija prodotta. 

It-tobba huma avżati li ma jieħdux riskji, jissorveljaw is-saħħa tagħhom, jiżviluppaw l-immunità, jagħmlu t-tilqim fil-ħin, u jekk jimirdu, imsejħa immedjatament lit-tabib għall-għajnuna u fl-ebda każ ma jagħmlu l-awto-medikazzjoni.
text.68:
Iris Hotel Siviri 3 * - Hotel, li fiha nixtieq li jirritornaw 

Halkidiki huwa l-qasam resort prinċipali tal-Greċja kontinentali. B'kuntrast mal-gżejjer li jinsabu fin-nofsinhar, il-peniżola mgħaddsa fil-aħdar jgħajjat, inkluż l-għoli tas-sħana tas-sajf. L-istaġun tal-vaganzi hawn ddum minn nofs ir-rebbiegħa sal-ħarifa kmieni - f'Settembru. Il-klima hija xotta, hekk it-trasferiment tas-sħana huwa faċli ħafna għall-turisti. 

Halkidiki hija peniżola li qisu Trident - bi tlett frottiet. Huwa protett sew mir-riħ mill-muntanji tal-madwar, għalhekk il-baħar huwa kważi dejjem kalm, sew imsaħħna. 

pajsaġġi pittoreski uniku, bajjiet tad-deheb, ilma nadif ċara, monumenti antiki, irħula tas-sajd u resorts lussu - dan kollu ġenna qed tistenna dawk li huma għaddejjin għall-mistrieħ fuq Cassandra - "tas-swaba" ta 'Halkidiki. 

Il-resort għandha lukandi tal-kategoriji kollha, minn appartamenti ħames stilel għal kmamar irħas disponibbli għall-turist medju, inkluż Russa. L-aħħar tinkludi l-baġit u l-Iris Hotel Siviri 3 *, li jirrevedi l-aktar pożittiv. 

informazzjoni ġenerali 

Il-lukanda, mibnija fl-2007, tinsab fuq il-peniżola ta 'Halkidiki, kilometru tmenin mill Tessaloniki. Madwar lilu, ġnien kbir, fejn ħafna siġar tal-palm, siġar taż-żebbuġ u tela boxxli. Aħħar redecorating kien implimentat fl-2014. Iris Hotel Siviri 3 * mibnija qrib il-villaġġ ta 'Siviri. territorju tiegħu jkun tmintax-il elf metru kwadru. Tessaloniki Ajruport --eqreb bogħod - imbiegħda disgħin kilometri. 

infrastruttura 

Star Iris Hotel Siviri 3 * hija cotta tmien sulari. Fil-qalba tagħha - il-bini amministrattiv jinsabu l-akkoljenza, dry cleaning,-ATM. Huwa possibbli li l-kera ta 'sikur-ċelluli, kif ukoll ħażna bagalji. Akkoljenza huwa miftuħ madwar l-arloġġ. Għalkemm il-lukanda u qal fissi ħin tal-wasla, madankollu, bla ħsara għad-approvazzjoni disponibbiltà jistgħu jiġu prattikati fi żmien inadatt. Tluq Ħin - nofsinhar. 

Fir-reġistru, inti tista 'wkoll tuża l-magna tal-faks, kif ukoll jirranġa tax-shuttle jew taxi. Il-lukanda kienet kmamar għall-mistednin b'diżabilità, kif ukoll il-kundizzjonijiet kollha, inkluż rampi għall-moviment ta 'siġġu tar-roti. Nimxu fl bl-annimali domestiċi ma jkunx provdut fil-lukanda. It-territorju għandu parkeġġ privat b'xejn, li mhix meħtieġa minn qabel lill riserva. 

Fond djar 

Il Iris Hotel Siviri 3 * kollha sebgħin sitta kmamar. Xi wħud minnhom kienu kompletament rinnovat fl-2014. Kategoriji kamra - Doubles u quadruples, bi spazju ta'25 u 30 metru kwadru. 

L-lukanda hija bl-arja kondizzjonata ispazju. Il-kmamar huma mgħammra ma 'sistema maqsuma, satellite TV, refriġeraturi, u xi wħud sikur, li tista' tuża għal miżata. Il kmamar Double kmamar stabbiliti żewġ sodod waħda, hemm il-possibbiltà ta 'extra bed. okkupanza massimu possibbli: 3 + 1 jew 2 + 2. Hemm ukoll terrazzin bl-għamara tal-plastik. kmamar jikkwadrupla huma żewġ sodod waħda u double sufan-sodda wieħed. 

Fil-banju flimkien ma doċċa, b'herdrijer. oġġetti iġjene aġġornata kuljum. -Istess frekwenza ta 'kmamar tat-tindif. Folji huma mibdula żewġ jew tliet darbiet fil-ġimgħa. 

Hotel Iris Hotel 3 * toffri żewġ kunċetti qawwa "full board" u "half board" tat-tip "buffet" fir-ristorant fit-tieni sular tal-bini prinċipali. Dawk interessati jistgħu jżuru l-à la carte ristorant u jitqiegħed fuq it-terrazzin. Joperaw fit-territorju ta 'żewġ bars --pool u fil-lobby. 

Pranzu serva għar-residenti Griega inbid - aħmar u abjad - fejn jagħżlu. 

Iris Hotel Siviri 3 * reviżjonijiet tal-alternattiva ikla gets bażikament l-uniku pożittiv. Il-lukanda tappartjeni għall-klassi ekonomika, iżda l-ikliet offruti huma sodisfatti ma 'kważi kollox. Il-menu hija dejjem ħafna ta 'laħam - minn fenek biex kustilji tal-majjal, varjetà ta' platti sekondarji, li jvarjaw mill-tradizzjonali
text.69:
(1) The price stipulated in a contract is not to be considered an unfair term. 

(2) A contract may include standard expressions, created to protected the needs of the trade, however these must also take into account the interests and rights of the consumer. 

Facts 

The parties had entered into an agreement whereby the plaintiff was to provide advertising services to the defendants. Payment was to be effected to the plaintiff only on condition that the property being advertised was sold within two years of the agreement being made, which indeed happened. The defendants never paid for such services, leading to the plaintiff instituting court procedures against them. The defendants pleaded that the plaintiff's claim was inadmissible due to various terms and conditions in the agreement being allegedly unjust or prohibited and therefore do not bind the defendants according to the Consumer Affairs Act (which implements Directive 93/13). The defendants also claimed that the sale of the property came about not by means of the services of the plaintiff. 

Legal issue 

The court held that the evaluation of whether a clause is unfair or not cannot be tied to the adequacy of the price or remuneration as compared to the object or services being provided. In addition, the plaintiff knew that two other estate agents were currently actively attempting to sell the property in question, and yet those agents were excluded from a list of agents whereby should any of them be successful, the price would be reduced. The court held that such behaviour on the part of the plaintiff was not compatible with good faith. 

Decision 

(1) Can a high price in a contract be considered an unfair term? 

(2) What constitutes in/compatibility with the requirement of good faith? 

Full Text 

Rikors guramentat. 

1. Illi permezz ta skrittura privata datata 24 ta Marzu 2010 iffirmata miz-zewg kontendenti, il-konvenuti inkarigaw lill- attrici sabiex tatihom servizz ta' reklamar fuq diversi forom tal-media. 

2. Illi s-servizzi ta reklamar hekk pattwiti kienu gew kollha mwettqa. 

3. Illi l-konvenuti kienu obbligati biss li jhallsu ghal tali servizzi ta' reklamar fil-kaz li tali proprjeta tinbiegh entro fi zmien sentejn mid-data tal-ftehim liema cirkostanza grat. 

4. Illi ghalhekk skond l-istess kondizzjonijiet stipulati u pattwiti fil-precitat ftehim, il-konvenuti huma debituri fil-konfront tal-attrici fl-ammont ta €16,107 hekk kif miftiehem kontrattwalment bejn l-odjerni kontendenti. 

5. Illi ghalkemm interpellati diversi drabi sabiex ihallsu dan id-debitu, inkluz permezz ta ittra ufficcjali ai termini tal-artikolu 166A Kap 12 tal-Ligijiet ta Malta li ggib in-numru 107/11, il-konvenuti mhux talli baqghu inadempjenti izda addirittura qed jallegaw in-nullita' tal-istess, liema allegazzjoni qed tigi kkontestata. 

6. Illi ghalhekk l-attrici kellha tistitwixxxi l-odjerni proceduri halli takkwista titolu esekuttiv fuq il-pretenzjoni kontrattwali kreditrici taghha kontra l-konvenuti. 

Ghaldaqstant l-attrici talbet sabiex ghar-ragunijiet premessi: 

Bl-ispejjes inkluzi dawk tal-ittra ufficcjali numru 107/11 u ta mandat ta sekwestru kawtelatorju prezentat kontestwalment mal-istess ittra ufficcjali u bl-imghaxijiet legali li jkomplu jiddekorru kontra l-intimati li minn issa qed jigu ngunti personalment biex jidhru ghas-subizzjoni. 

1. Il-konvenuti kienu s-sidien tal-fond numru 23, Estonville, Triq Censu Bugeja, Iklin. 

2. Fl-24 ta' Marzu 2010 il-kontendenti ffirmaw ftehim sabiex il-kumpannija
text.70:
Cupcake Cupcakes 

Cupcakes bi qara Pumpkin huwa ġeneralment majjal imsajjar, dixxijiet sekondarji, ġamm, qargħa oħra hija użata għall-insalati, casseroles u deżerti, jien ukoll insajru dan kollu u għadhom nużawha fil-ħami. Speċjalment inħobb żagħfran fragranti u cupcakes tal-qara 'ċikkulata, li r-riċetta tagħhom se naqsam. Dawn huma tajbin fil-forma ta 'muffins żgħar b'biċċiet żgħar, u cupcakes kbar, u anki fil-forma ta' kejk strixxa magħmula minn żewġ tipi ta 'għaġina. Ipprova kollha jew waħda mill-għażliet għas-saħħa tiegħek u parti sabiħa tat-te. 

Pass 1 Biex tagħmel 12 cupcakes żgħar għandek bżonn qargħa ħamra, trab tal-ħami, zokkor, bajd, butir (jew marġerina għall-ħami), żagħfran u kawkaw. 

Pass 5 L-għaġina għall-kejkijiet taż-żagħfran tal-qara ħamra hija lesta, nofsha hija mifruxa fuq moffa jew moffa ta 'silikon. 

Pass 6 Fit-tieni nofs tat-test, żid il-kawkaw u ħallat sakemm tkun bla xkiel. 

Stadju 7 L-għaġina taċ-ċikkulata tinfirex ukoll fuq forom igglejżjati jew silikon. Agħmel cupcakes żgħar bħal dawn f'temperatura ta'200 ° C għal madwar 20 minuta. 

Pass 8 Muffins mitmuma joħorġu mill-imwarrbin, u wara t-tkessiħ, sprinkle bit-trab taz-zokkor jew iżżejnu l-Predisposizzjoni tiegħek!
text.71:
Kif tneħħi VKSaver mill-kompjuter tiegħek? 

Spazji tal-Internet huma mimlija bil-varjetà ta 'applikazzjonijiet biex tniżżel awdjo u vidjo mill-netwerk soċjali VKontakte. Fost dawn hemm kemm ħielsa u mħallsa, kemm jaħdmu u moshennicheskie- xi għażla. Wieħed mill-programmi l-aktar popolari ta 'din il-kategorija hija VKSaver. Madankollu, ħafna utenti li installati l-programm, innota l-fenomeni mhux tas-soltu jseħħu mal-kompjuter. Spiss kien hemm ebda buttuna biex tniżżel mużika jew video, u jekk kien, huwa spiss meta paġna tniżżil "tellgħu". Barra minn hekk, iż-żieda notevoli fil-viruses katastrofiċi. Dan huwa għaliex ħafna nies wara l-użu qasir ta 'l-applikazzjoni għamlet id-deċiżjoni biex jitneħħew VKSaver. Spiss, madankollu, rriżulta li mhuwiex faċli. 

F'dan l-artikolu, aħna se tiddeskrivi diversi modi ta 'kif tneħħi VKSaver. 

Metodu 1: Kif uninstall VKSaver jużaw standard OS Windows 

Biex tagħmel dan, mur l-Control Panel (taqsima Software u Applikazzjonijiet / Installa jew Neħħi Programs). Fil -waqgħa-lista, insibu l-isem tal-programm tagħna u ikklikkja "Uninstall." Jekk dan il-metodu jaħdem tajjeb ħafna. Spiss, madankollu, li ħafna jgħidu li l-programm isem VKSaver ma tkunx fil-lista ta 'programmi installati, jew meta tħassar il-messaġġ li l-applikazzjoni ma tistax titħassar minħabba li huwa użat minn proċess ieħor. F'dan il-każ, aħna tipproċedi għall-pass li jmiss. 

Metodu 2: Biex tħassar VKSaver bl-użu tar-reġistru 

Fi kwalunkwe każ, il-programm huwa preżenti fil-menu istartjar. Dan huwa evidenzjat mill-fatt li meta tibda kompjuter tiegħek, icon tagħha jidher fil-bar fil-qiegħ dritt kantuniera. Sabiex uninstall sew il-programm, trid tneħħiha mill-menu istartjar. Biex tagħmel dan, mur fil-menu Bidu, imbagħad ikklikkja Run / msconfig / Istartjar. Hawnhekk aħna tneħħi l-VKSaver qurdien. Għall-bidliet jidħlu fis-seħħ, għandek bżonn li reboot. Barra minn hekk, wara twettiq ta 'dawn l-azzjonijiet, kombinazzjoni jirreklutaw Win + R (linja ta' kmand sejħa) u t-tip fil-regedit linja kelma. Aħna kiseb aċċess għall-reġistrazzjonijiet. It-tfittxija (Ctrl + F) ittajpjat l-isem tal-programm tagħna, ir-riżultati tat-tiftix tneħħi fallen. Għandu jiġi mfakkar li, qabel VKSaver neħħi mir-reġistru, inti għandek tagħmel kopja backup (-Fajls / Esportazzjoni / Save fuq id-diska jitneħħa (jew kwalunkwe nuqqas ta 'sistema ta' sewqan oħra)). Wara dan, aħna tneħħi l-shortcuts tal-programm u scan sistema tiegħek għall-virusijiet. Istartjar mill-ġdid il-kompjuter. 

Metodu 3: Kif tneħħi awtomatikament VKSaver Sal-lum, hemm varjetà kbira ta 'utilitajiet, it-tneħħija applikazzjonijiet mhux użati fuq il-kompjuter tiegħek. Dawn jissejħu l-programm 'deistallyatory. Jekk ma tkunx taf liema tip ta 'minnhom biex tagħżel, inti tista google u aqra reviżjonijiet utent. Tista 'wkoll tixtri l-verżjoni demo tal-miżata programm, normalment id-data ta' skadenza huwa 30 jum. L-għodda l-aktar popolari li uninstall - dan Revo Uninstaller Pro u ħielsa Uninstall Hu. Minbarra l tindif sħiħa tal-hard drive li minnha sar softwer bla bżonn, dawn l-applikazzjonijiet għandhom ħafna karatteristiċi utli oħra. Wara l-iskadenza ta 'perjodu ħieles użu kondizzjonali, inti tista' tixtri ewlieni.
text.72:
Il-gazzetta MaltaToday żvelat li Bogdanovic, li hi ddeskriviet bħala ħabib tal-qalb tal-Ministru Justyne Caruana, irċieva kuntratt ta' tliet xhur ta' €15,000 biex jaħdem fuq il-kurrikulu nazzjonali tal-isport, minkejja li m'għandux kwalifiki pedagoġiċi. 

It-talba lil Hyzler saret mill-kandidat indipendenti Prof. Arnold Cassola, “billi jingħad li Bogdanovic hu l-boyfriend tal-Ministru.” 

Intant, l-NGO Repubblika kkundannat bil-qawwa d-deċiżjoni tal-Ministru li tagħti kuntratt bħal dak lil Bogdanovic meta dan mhux kwalifikat. 

L-għaqda staqsiet jekk il-Prim Ministru Robert Abela hux se jieħu azzjoni kontra l-Ministru.
text.74:
Qabel u wara t-Tieni Gwerra Dinjija, l-Istati Uniti sar ċentru ta 'attività mużikali. Bosta kompożituri mill-Ewropa mċaqalqa lejn l-Istati Uniti u xi wħud minnhom saħansitra saru membri tal-fakultà. Skopri l-forom u l-istili tal-mużika, flimkien mal-kompożituri u l-mużiċisti, li ddefinixxew il-mużika tas-seklu għoxrin. 

Formoli ta 'Mużika u Stili tas-Seklu 20 

Sistema tat-12-tone: Terminu prinċipalment attribwit lil Arnold Schoenberg, li ried jelimina ċ-ċentru tat-ton. Huwa żviluppa teknika msejħa sistema 12-ton fejn it-12-il noti kollha ta 'l-ottava huma ta' l-istess importanza. In-noti ta'12 jitqiegħdu f'ordni speċifiku msejjaħ "tone-row" jew "tone-series," u l-ebda nota mhija ripetuta f'ringiela. Din il-mużika evokata li ħassitha ansjuża u mhux solvuta. 

Mużika tal-Kunċert: Ħafna kompożituri flimkien flimkien ma 'mużika ta' mużika jazz mużikali bħal mużika klassika u blu. Il-mużika matul dan iż-żmien tkellmet ukoll dwar il-fervur nazzjonalista. Xi wħud mill-kompożituri li x-xogħlijiet tagħhom kienu apprezzati ħafna kienu George Gershwin (Rhapsody in Blue), Aaron Copland (Rodeo) u Dmitry Shostakovich (The Golden Age). 

Mużika Elettronika: Kompożituri ta 'mużika elettronika esperimentati bit-teknoloġija u kif taffettwa ċerti aspetti tal-mużika bħall- melodija u r-ritmu . 

Impressionist: Dan it-terminu ġej mill-pittur Monet, fix-xogħol, Impressjoni, Sunrise . Fil-mużika, huwa applikat għal xogħlijiet ta 'kompożituri ta' seklu għoxrin bikrija bħal Debussy. Debussy ċaħad ir-regoli tat-tonalità u l-mużika maħluqa li hija pjaċevoli għall-widnejn peress li l-pitturi impressjonanti huma attraenti għall-għajnejn. Dan irriżulta fi mużika li kienet rilassata u kważi ħolm. 

Minimalism: Din it-tip ta 'mużika kienet mudelli sempliċi u li dehru li ġew ripetuti u appoġġjati minn taħdit sod. Il-mużika ta 'Steve Reich u Philip Glass ġew immarkati bħala tali. 

Neoklassiku: Terminu applikat għall-mużika ta 'kompożituri bikrija tas-seklu għoxrin bħal Stravinsky li tirrifletti l-mużika tas-seklu tmintax. Ix-xogħlijiet ta 'Stravinsky, b'mod partikolari wara r- Rite tar-Rebbiegħa milqugħ tajjeb ħafna, ma enfasizzawx it-tonalità iżda ħassewhom imrażżna. Stravinsky ġie skopert minn Sergei Diaghilev, il-produttur tal-Ballet Rouse. Ix-xogħlijiet preċedenti tiegħu kienu jirriflettu l-influwenzi minn dissussjoni ta 'Debussy u mudelli ritmiki irregolari. 

Serialism: Din kienet ibbażata fuq is-sistema ta'12-ton ta' Schoenberg, li tkompliet mill-istudent Anton von Webern. Is-serialism kien evidenti fil-mużika tas-snin 50 u 60 iżda l-apprezzament kien limitat għall-professuri tal-università u għall-istudenti tagħhom. Is-serialism użat formula mużikali stretta li kienet diffiċli biex tilgħab. Il-kompożituri li użaw din it-teknika kienu Milton Babbitt u Pierre Boulez, biex insemmu ftit. 

John Cage: Kompożitur Amerikan tas-Seklu 20 magħruf għall-ideat innovattivi u avant-garde tiegħu li joħloq u japprezza l-mużika. Huwa fassal il- "pjaneta ppreparata." 

Henry Cowell: Il-kompożitur Amerikan, u wieħed mill-inventuri ta 'strument elettriku msejjaħ "ritmiku", li kiteb biċċiet fejn il-mużiċisti kellhom il-keys ta' piano billi jolqtuh bl-dirgħajn jew il-polz tagħhom u qtugħ jew iġbed il-kordi. 

Edgard Varese: Wieħed mill-kompożituri li esperimentaw bil-mużika u t-teknoloġija. Huwa kiteb biċċa għal orkestra komposta minn strumenti biss ta 'perkussjoni. Huwa għamel ukoll esperiment ma 'mużika msewwija u strumenti elettroniċi.
text.75:
X'għandek tkun taf Qabel Tixtri Eżerċizzju Pilates Mat 

Il-biċċa l-kbira ta 'studenti ddedikati tal-Pilates għandhom twapet Pilates li huma mfassla minn bażijiet ta' l-injam u miksija b'mod artifiċjali. B'differenza yoga, f'tali studios, studenti tal-Pilates ma jaslux għal workout bit-twapet tagħhom stess. Mela x'jagħmlu l-prattikanti tal-Pilates meta jkunu jridu jaħdmu barra mill-istudju? A tapit yoga? Mhux eżatt. Huma jużaw mats ta 'eżerċizzju tad-dar huma speċifikament adattati għal Pilates . 

Qabel ma tagħbija l-shopping cart tiegħek, aqra biex issir taf liema stili, speċifikazzjonijiet u materjali huma xierqa għal workout Pilates. Jekk possibbli, ittestja drive-tapit qabel ma tagħmel impenn. 

Ħoxna jew irqaq 

Mats Pilates u yoga huma simili fid-daqs, iżda d-differenza ewlenija hija l-ħxuna. A tapit yoga standard huwa wieħed minn tmienja ta 'pulzier oħxon. Għal Pilates, huwa imperattiv li t-tapit huwa eħxen u / jew dens aktar minn tapit tal-yoga. Il-yoga timpjega ħafna aktar eżerċizzji permanenti li jeħtieġu tapit li jappoġġja proprioception u bilanċ aħjar. Pilates, min-naħa l-oħra, juża t-tapit għal volum akbar ta 'eżerċizzji fuq id-dahar u l-istonku tiegħek. Pilates jirrikjedi wkoll li l-istudenti jwettqu ammont sinifikanti ta 'eżerċizzji ta' rrolljar ta 'l-ispina. Ipprova dawk fuq tapita rqiqa tal-yoga u int tgħid kelma waħda. Ouch! It-twapet tal-yoga jagħmlu użu minn finitura li teħel li tgħin biex tevita li tiżloq. L-eżerċizzji tal-Pilates ma jiddependux fuq din il-karatteristika u bosta eżerċizzji jibbenefikaw minn erja tas-superfiċje li tinxtorob. 

Agħżel tapit li huwa ta 'nofs pulzier ħoxnin. Twapet ġodda li għandhom fowm dens ħafna jistgħu jipprovdu ttaffi adattati fi tliet eights biss ta 'pulzier. Kwalunkwe inqas minn dak u inti tista 'tħoss l-effetti ta' sinsla li tkun imbenġla wara li tagħmel it-tapit tiegħek. 

It-twapet tas-saħħa standard huma madwar żewġ saqajn wiesa 'b'sitt piedi twal. 

A rutina sħiħa tal-bsaten tal-Pilates ċertament tista 'tinkiseb fuq tapit standard tal-yoga. Madankollu, jista 'jkollok aktar għażliet hekk kif il-prattika tiegħek timxi fuq paletta kemmxejn usa'. Jekk l-ispazju ma jkunx fattur li jillimita, fittex tabib tal-gymnasium fl-iskola l-qadima fejn tista 'tistira u tuża l-wiċċ sħiħ disponibbli. 

Agħżel tapp li jixraq l-ispazju personali tiegħek. Jekk possibbli, varjetà ta 'twapet ta' fitness industrijali għandhom disponibbli f'ħafna daqsijiet. Marda ta 'erba' mili bi tmien saqajn tas-saqajn hija perfettament vijabbli għal tapit ta 'Pilates tad-dar. 

Għażliet ta 'Densità 

Xi materjali ġodda jgħaqqdu b'suċċess id-densità u t-ttaffi fi profil iktar baxx, tapit irqaq. X'hemm l-iktar importanti hu li inti teżamina fiżikament it-tapit. Għandek żewġ għażliet fir-rigward tad-densità. Struttura ta 'densità ħoxna li tipprovdi biżżejjed ttaffi għas-sinsla tad-dahar f'petri sod ħafna. Imma tista 'wkoll tagħżel b'tapit tal-ġinnast li hija ħafna eħxen ħafna inqas sod. L-irtubija ta 'tapit tal-ġinnastika tfisser li jkollok inqas appoġġ u li fil-fatt tista' tipprovdi sfida akbar għall-ġisem. 

Agħżel tapit li huwa dens biżżejjed biex iżomm il-kuxxinett tas-sinsla iżda jagħżel itaffu skond il-preferenza. It-twapet tad-ditta għandhom il-post tagħhom u twapet irqaq huma wkoll utli ħafna għal Pilates fid-dar. 

Mur Pro? 

Jekk l-ispazju u l-baġit mhumiex kwistjoni u qed tfittex esperjenzi awtentiċi fid-dar Pilates, tikkunsidra li tmur fuq livell pro. Il-manifatturi tal-Pilates ibiegħu lil studjows kif ukoll lill-individwi. Twapet stil Studio għandhom għażliet bħal kavilji injam għal idejk, aċċessorji bħal kaxxi żgħar u ċineg li ganċ fuq
text.76:
X'inhu fil-fażi kurrent elettriku 

Dwar fażi inti tista 'spiss tisma konverżazzjoni dwar l-elettriku. Imma, naturalment, il-kelma għandha tifsira ferm usa '. X'inhu l-fażi ta 'ċiklu tagħha, huwa konness ma art. Fuq dan u ħafna affarijiet oħra nitgħallmu fl-artikolu li jmiss. 

X'inhu l-fażi 

Fil-fiżika jifhmu taħt fażi stat wieħed ta 'materja (eż, l-ilma huwa l-likwidu, kristall likwidu, kristallin, jew stat ta' gass tal-aggregazzjoni). Barra minn hekk, hu mifhum mill-istadju fiċ-ċiklu tal-oxxillazzjoni (per eżempju, mewġa mozzjoni). 

Fl-astronomija, il-kelma għandha tifsira differenti. X'inhu l-fażi f'dan xjenza, nistgħu nifhmu mill-osservazzjonijiet tal-ġisem ċelesti Dinja (eż l-Qamar). Dan huwa, jista 'jiġi definit bħala l-porzjon viżibbli tal-oġġett ċelesti emisfera mdawla mill-Dinja. 

Fit-teorija ekonomika huwa magħruf sew li f'din il-fażi taċ-ċiklu. Dan huwa meta huwa osservat ċertu perjodu ta 'żmien (ċiklu) attività naturali. 

Ikkunsidra dak tfisser terminu għall-elettriku. 

elettriku fażi 

Taf l-oriġini tal-elettriku fl-impjanti? Kullimkien il-prinċipju ta 'okkorrenza tagħha ta' wieħed u l-istess: il-rotazzjoni tal-kalamita ġewwa l-coil twassal biex fatt li jidher fil- kurrent alternanti. Dan l-effett tissejjaħ forza elettromotiva jew induzzjoni forza elettromotiva. Il kalamita ddawwar imsejjaħ il-rotor u mehmuża madwar il-kojl - il stator. 

Il-vultaġġ li jalterna huwa miksub minn kostanti meta din bent mill-sine, b'hekk jintlaħaq il-pożittiv, il-valur negattiv ta 'dan. 

Għalhekk, il-kalamita tkun miexja, per eżempju, mill-fluss ta 'ilma. Peress li l-rotor fluss manjetiċi bidliet il-ħin kollu. Għalhekk, vultaġġ li jalterna. Meta t-tliet kojls, kull sett wieħed minnhom għandu ċirkwit elettriku separata, u ġewwa fih hemm l-istess valur varjabbli, fejn il-fażi vultaġġ jixxaqleb circumferentially fil mija u għoxrin gradi, jiġifieri terz fir-rigward tal-wieħed li jinsab fil-qrib. 

Jew, jipprovdu l-dar bħal qabel? 

Din l-iskema huwa msejjaħ il-tliet fażijiet. Iżda int tista sikur qawwa l-dar u bl-għajnuna ta 'wieħed mill-kojl. L-ewwel tmiem tal-kojl biss konness ma l-art, u t-tieni - li jwassal għall-dar, fejn il-wajer hu mqabbad, per eżempju, biex timla l-kitla. It-tieni plug Pronolagus waqt ertjat. Niżżel l-istess elettriku. 

Il-firxa ta tliet fażijiet attwali 

Tliet fażi attwali hija fornita lill-dar permezz ta 'linji ta' enerġija (fejn il-vultaġġ jilħaq ħamsa u tletin kilovolts). Huwa maħsub li huwa l-aktar mod ekonomiku u min-naħat kollha mill-iktar vantaġġjuża meta mqabbla mal-xokk konvenzjonali. 

L-industrija tal-ikel huwa eżattament tliet fażijiet attwali, peress li l-istruttura ddur huwa faċli biex jibnu, u b'mod ġenerali huwa aktar mobbli u għandha kapaċità kbira. 

wajer 

Aħna ser jifhmu li tali fażi, art u konduttur newtrali, f'aktar dettall. 

Huwa faċli li wieħed jimmaġina bi tliet fażijiet ġeneratur mal-compound skond il- "stilla." punt ta 'konnessjoni Fażi tissejjaħ newtrali. 

Huwa normalment msejsa biex tiżdied is-sigurtà, kif jekk il-mezz jonqos, fin-nuqqas ta 'art, joħolqu periklu għall-bnedmin. Meta inti touch-istrument sempliċiment billi xokk elettriku. Iżda jekk ikun hemm wisq art hemm tnixxija attwali u l-ebda riskju ma jkunx iffurmat. 

Allura, kollha flimkien - newtrali, earth u fażi wajers huma meħtieġa biex jiżguraw is-sigurtà tal-persuni. Fil-bini ġdid taħt kostruzzjoni huwa pprovdut sistema bħal din, filwaqt li huwa nieqes fil-qodma. 

fażi ta 'definizzjoni 

Xi kultant huwa neċessarju li jiġi ddeterminat fejn il-wire fażi. Għall-ħwienet tas-soltu, huwa forsi mhux neċessarju. Iżda meta konnessi, per eżempju, il-linef, il-fażi għandha tiġi sottomessa direttament lill-swiċċ, żero - direttament mal-lampi. Imbagħad, jekk id-dawl huwa off, meta persuna jissostitwixxi l-bozza ma
text.77:
Il-Ġermanja tikseb rebħa importanti u l-Olanda tkompli l-perjodu pożittiv 

L-Olanda kompliet il-perjodu pożittiv hekk kif kien mistenni għelbet lill-Estonja 4-0 fi Grupp Ċ. RYAN BABEL fetaħ l-iskor fis-17-il minuta meta daħal tajjeb għall-kross fil-baxx mix-xellug u skorja mill-ewwel b'xutt bil-kaxxa ż-żgħira. L-istess RYAN BABEL irdoppja mal-ftuħ tat-tieni taqsima meta din id-darba rċieva kross mil-lemin u skorja b'daqqa ta' ras. L-iskor sar 3-0 fis-76 minuta b'xutt fil-baxx ta' MEMPHIS DEPAY minn tarf il-kaxxa li spiċċa fir-rokna. Kien għad fadal ħin għar-raba' gowl li wasal fis-87 minuta bi free-kick mil-lemin ta' Depay isib lil GEORGINIO WIJNALDUM li skorja b'daqqa ta' ras ċentrali, f'azzjoni li l-gowlkiper seta' jagħmel aħjar. 

Il-Ġermanja rkuprat mit-telfa fl-aħħar logħba kontra l-Olanda meta tat l-ewwel telfa lill-Irlanda ta' Fuq b'rebħa ta' 2-0. Huma fetħu l-iskor fit-48 minuta meta kross mil-lemin għadda tul il-lasta u spiċċa għand MARCEL HALSTENBERG li b'xutt mill-isbaħ għeleb lil Bailey Peacock-Farrell, bix-xutt jispiċċa fir-rokna ta' fuq tax-xibka. Huma għalqu l-logħba fit-93 minuta meta s-sostitut Kai Havertz għadda vertikalment lejn SERGE GNABRY li skorja b'xutt minn pożizzjoni angolata. 

Minn Grupp I l-Belġju kisbet is-sitt rebħa konsekuttiva u baqgħet b'punti massimi wara rebħa kbira ta' 4-0 barra pajjiżhom kontra l-Iskozja. ROMELU LUKAKU fetaħ l-iskor wara disa' minuti meta f'kontrattakk, Dries Mertens tefa' ballun vertikali lejn Kevin de Bruyne li avvanza u fetaħ fuq il-lemin lejn l-attakkant li skorja minn qagħda ideali. THOMAS VERMAELEN irdoppja fit-23 minuta meta skorja mill-viċin wara kross mil-lemin. It-tim ta' Roberto Martinez għamel l-iskor 3-0 b'daqqa ta' ras għar-rokna ta' TOBY ALDERWEIRELD minn korner mil-lemin. KEVIN DE BRUYNE ssiġilla r-rebħa fit-82 minuta meta rċieva mingħand Lukaku u skorja b'xutt preċiż għar-rokna. 

Mill-istess grupp, rebħa importanti għar-Russja li għelbu lill-Każakistan 1-0 b'daqqa ta' ras ta' MARIO FERNANDES fid-89 minuta minn free-kick ta' Aleksandr Golovin. 

Minn Grupp E, il-Kroazja kienet miżmuma 1-1, bl-Ażerbajġan tikseb l-ewwel punt fil-grupp. LUKA MODRIC fetaħ l-iskor minn penalty fil-11-il minuta iżda l-Ażerbajġan ġabet id-draw fit-72 minuta b'azzjoni personali mill-aqwa ta' TAMKIN KHALILZADE.
text.78:
Attard's AD councillor condemns vandalism of trees at Wied ta' Rmiedi 

AD's Attard councillor Ralph Cassar has condemned the vandalism of around 15 trees in Wied ta' Rmiedi this week. He said it was clear that the vandals knew what they were doing because they ringed the main trunk of the trees, an operation that would lead to their destruction. 

“A 20-year effort to plan indigenous trees and improve the natural environment has been destroyed in a matter of hours,” he said. 

He appealed to anyone who might have information to speak up and requested the council to file an official police report. 

– 

Kundanna għal vandaliżmu fuq għad ta' siġar f'Wied ta' Rmiedi F'Ħ'Attard 

Ralph Cassar, Kunsillier ta' AD f'Ħ'Attard qal li f'din l-aħħar ġimgħa sar att vandalu fuq madwar 15-il ta' siġra tal-luq maturi f'Wied ta' Rmiedi F'Ħ'Attard. “Huwa ċar li min ivvandalizza s-siġar, li diġa qegħdin imutu, jaf x'qed jagħmel għax saret ħsara apposta fiz-zokk prinċipali ta' kull siġra, liema hsara magħrufa bħala ‘ringing' twassal għall-qerda ta' dawn is-siġar.” 

“Xogħol ta' 20 sena biex jitħawwlu siġar indiġeni u jittejjeb l-ambjent naturali spiċċa meqrud fi ftit siegħat.” 

“Il-protezzjoni tas-siġar mhux ta' prijorita' għall-awtoritajiet u hawn kultura ta' omerta, fejn min jagħmel vendikazzjoni u ħsara rasu mistrieħa li mhux se jinqabad. Nappella lil kull min għandu informazzjoni, speċjalment residenti li joqgħodu faċċata tal-parti tal-wied fi Triq Wied ta' Rmiedi, f'Ħ'Attard dwar min għamel dan l-att tal-mistħija biex jitkellem. Tlabt lill-Kunsill Lokali ta' Ħ'Attard jagħmel rapport uffiċċjali lill-Pulizija.”
text.79:
Kif tapplika l-verniċ ġell: tips u tricks 

Ġel lustrar - prodott rivoluzzjonarju. Huwa kombinazzjoni ta 'verniċ u ġell. lustrar ġel se toħloq manikjur ta 'ġimgħatejn. Wara kollox, huwa kapaċi li jibqgħu fuq l-imsiemer mingħajr l-ċpar u laqx għal żewġ ġimgħat jew aktar. Kif tapplika l-verniċ ġell? X'inhuma l-sfumaturi u sigrieti għall-ħolqien tal-manikjur perfetta magħha? 

Applika ġel saff irqiq ta verniċ. Jekk meħtieġ, jista 'jiġi faċilment jitneħħa bil f'likwidu speċjali (remuvera), filwaqt li l-ġellijiet biss jibnu buff jitneħħew u serrar. Wara l-applikazzjoni mhijiex meħtieġa simulazzjoni u pjanċa tad-dwiefer zapilivanija. 

lustrar ġell. applikazzjoni tat-teknoloġija 

Tibda proċedura manikjur (tindif cuticles permezz nakozhnits). 

Wara dan, l-imsiemer ttrattati iddeidra, jekk meħtieġ, neħħi l-xaħam mill-pjanċa tad-dwiefer. 

Applika primer. 

Issa għandna bżonn biex tapplika l-bażi ġell. Dan jista 'jinbiegħ separatament jew flimkien ma' l-topcoat. Kif tapplika l-verniċ ġell? Applika rqiq ħafna. Poġġi l-imsiemer fil-lampa UV għal 2 minuti. Pre jinqara istruzzjonijiet lill-ġell-verniċ, peress li l-ħin azjenda fil-lampa UV jistgħu jvarjaw. 

xkupilja xotta jew drapp speċjali biex tneħħi umdità żejda mill-dwiefer. 

Kif tapplika ġel dwiefer kulur aktar saturati? Biex tibda, titħejja: roll-flixkun tal-verniċ ġel bejn idejk għal 20 sekonda. Għal tbajja aħjar għandhom japplikaw żewġ kowtijiet. Tinsiex li nixxef il-dwiefer fil-bozza wara kull applikazzjoni. L-ewwel saff ta 'Laker ikkulurit huwa aħjar li tagħmel irqaq ħafna, kważi trasluċidi. Iżda t-tieni tista 'ssir eħxen - għal kulur isbaħ u saturati. 

L-aħħar stadju - Fixer. Applika u nixxfu fil-fanal. A dettall importanti ħafna huwa l-applikazzjoni ta 'ġel verniċ mhux biss fuq il-wiċċ, iżda wkoll fuq l-aħħar tad-dwiefer. Jekk inti skip din il-parti, il-manikjur se aħħar twil ħafna. 

Kif tistgħu taraw, l-applikazzjoni ta 'ġel-lustrar - huwa pjuttost sempliċi. Stick xi struzzjonijiet, u jiksbu manikjur sbieħ u durabbli. 

It-tneħħija lustrar ġel 

Fil-fatt, bħala l-kawża ta 'verniċ ġel, mifhuma, u li kif biex tneħħiha? Din il-proċedura hija saħansitra aktar faċli. Huwa meħtieġ li imprenjazzjoni tajjara b'likwidu speċjali, iwaħħalha man-pjanċa tad-dwiefer u l-labra quċċata wrap fojl. Ħalli għal 10 minuti u imbagħad bil-galbu neħħi l-għatu b'mezzi vireg. 

Ħażna sewwa Ġell verniċ 

Mhux l-inqas fl-importanza hija l-kwistjoni ta 'Laker ħażna ġel. X'għandi nagħmel sabiex tinżamm sakemm dan ikun possibbli? Fil-kompożizzjoni tal-verniċ ġell huwa solvent simili għal dawk li jinsabu fil laker konvenzjonali. Għalhekk, il-kundizzjonijiet ta 'ħażna għal dan se jkun l-istess: jinħażnu f'temperatura tal-kamra u minnufih wara li jintuża għatu magħluq sewwa. Fuq evaporazzjoni tas-solvent mir-verniċ ġell kunjett isir wisq ħoxna li jinterferixxi japplikaw saff irqiq. 

Ġel lustrar - xi ħaġa ġdida, li hija min jipprova kull wieħed mill-sess ġust. Ladarba inti tagħmel manicures tuża din l-għodda, inti żgur li jgawdu l-benefiċċji kollha tagħha.
text.80: Preheat il-forn għal 200 grad. Il-brunġiel sħaħ huma minjieri u naqqsu d-dnub. Aħna nagħżlu kull veġetali separatament fil-fojl u nibagħtuh fil-forn għal 45 minuta. Waqt li qed tħejji l-brunġiel, aħna nvoluti fil-laħam tal-mogħoż. Flett tat-tiġieġ maqtugħ f'biċċiet żgħar. Fry dawn il-biċċiet f'żejt veġetali sakemm kannella dehbi. Agħmel regolarment il-basal u l-bżar u fryhom sakemm itaffihom. Hekk kif il-laħam jiġi kannella għal kulur tad-deheb, żid 100 ml ta 'ilma, melħ, bżar u stew taħt għatu magħluq. Issa lura għall-ħxejjex - żid il-pejst tat-tadam u l-paprika fihom, ħallat, ferra '100 ml ilma u ħalliha tgħalli. Ħaxix ippreparat huwa miżjud mal-laħam. Jekk il-ħxejjex ma jkollhomx biżżejjed ilma - skuraw ferra 'ftit u ħallihom jistiednu fuq nar żgħir għal madwar 20 minuta. Nieħdu l-brunġiel mill-forn u kessaħha. Imbagħad ineħħu l-ġilda mill-brunġiel. Nagħmlu patata mbaffija bil-blender. Meta l-laħam ikun lest, ferra krema qarsa fih, żid il-qronfol imqattgħin tat-tewm, ħallat. Jekk il-massa hija pjuttost likwida, tista 'żżid 1 tablespoon ta' dqiq u ħallat. Wara 5 minuti, itfi t-tiġieġ u ħallih imur. Issa qed nippreparaw il-zalza tal-ħalib - l-aħħar element tad-dixx. Biex tagħmel dan, f'tazza, dewweb il-butir, żid id-dqiq u ħallat sakemm tkun bla xkiel. Bi ftit pour fil-taħlita ta 'ħalib sħun, tħawwad kontinwament. Fuq nar żgħir b'tressjar kostanti ġġib il-zalza sakemm tkun ħoxna. Meta l-zalza tkun lesta, żid melħ, anana, u ħallat kollox għal darb'oħra. Ħallat il-puree tal-brunġiel biż-zalza. Imxerred fuq pjanċa ta 'brunġiel biż-zalza, u mbagħad fuq il-laħam. Bon appetit!
text.81:
Mel Gibson u Rosalind Ross wrew it-tifel ritratt fuq it-tapit aħmar tal-Oscar 

Missier kbatur Mel Gibson, wara li wasal għall-Oscar bl-imħabba tiegħu Rosalind Ross, li tah it-disa 'tifel tiegħu xahar ilu, qasmu l-ewwel ritratt ta' ibnu mal-pubbliku. 

Little baby 

Fl-20 ta 'Jannar, il-qaddis ta' 61 sena, Mel Gibson ħa lil ibnu Lars Gerard f'armi. Kif sar magħruf għall-midja, fit-twelid it-tifel żamm biss 2.4 kilogrammi. Għalkemm ir-rappreżentanti tal-attur assiguraw li t-tifel u l-ommu, Rosalind Ross ta'26 sena, iħossuhom kbar, il-partitarji għadhom jibżgħu għas-saħħa tat-tarbija. Barra minn hekk, la Mel u lanqas Rosalind, minkejja t-talbiet kollha tal-fannijiet, ma għaħqux biex ittella 'l-ewwel ritratti ta' ibnu fin-netwerk soċjali. 

Tweġiba għall-mistoqsija 

Fost l-istilel ta 'Hollywood li għadda tul il-tapit aħmar "Oscar-2017", kien impossibbli li ma tiġix avżata Mel Gibson u l-ħabiba tiegħu Rosalind Ross, li tbissem, li tpoġġi għal flashes tal-kamera. 

Il-kittieb, li welldet binha biss ħames ġimgħat ilu, deher eleganti fi libsa blu artab b'ferrovija strapless minn Paolo Sebastian. It-tulle attire enfasizza l-figura graceful ta 'l-omm żgħażagħ, li kien kapaċi malajr jiksbu forma kbira wara t-tqala. 

Il-ġurnalisti, li talbu mistoqsijiet ta 'Gibson fil-gallerija tar-ritratti tal-avveniment, talbu dwar ibnu. L-attur ma rtirax mir-risposta, qal li hu jrid juri sparatura ta 'sturdament, u jħares lejn liema, ma jistax jgħin biex jitbissem. Mel ħa t-telefon u wera r-ritratt ta 'Lars Gerard.

Angelo Chetcuti, will be replacing Bjorn Vassallo as Secretary-General of the Malta Football Association, after the latter was awarded a post within FIFA.

Chetcuti is Vice President of Birzebbuga FC and a member of the MFA Council and Executive.This news was confirmed at the MFA Council held this afternoon at the Centenary Stadium hall, in Ta 'Qali.

Chetcuti starts in the post of MFA Secretary-General effectively from 1 December 2016.

In a statement, the MFA congratulated Vassallo in his new role while thanking Angelo Chetcuti in his new post.

translation.2:
Chrysler: Luxury brand or not?

Brand moves mainstream, whether we like or not.

Way back in May, Chrysler CEO Al Gardner told media members that they had gathered to learn about the following Fiat Chrysler (FCA) product plans that Chrysler has noIt continues to be considered a luxury brand or a premium brand, but a major brand.Well, I have a small bone to choose that approach.

On the one hand, I understand why the FCA is doing it.The FCA chose Dodge, who was previously considered the leading brand, as more sports / performance brand.

So it leaves Chrysler to fill the gap.Problem is, people have long loved Chrysler as a luxury brand, regardless of both minivans and mainstream sedans from the medium size (cough, sebring, cough).

It seems Chrysler thinks this way too.Sure, the newest iteration of 200 is positioned as a car from the main size, but is being marketed like a luxury car.The 300 full-size sedan is also positioned as a luxury alternative to the Dodge Charger.

In addition, Dodge is not entirely waiving for non-performance vehicles, as it will continue to sell the cruise journey and the Durango SUV.

So what is Chrysler at that time?Is it a luxury brand or a mainstream brand or both?

Right now is a brand with only three products for sale: 200, 300, and Minivan Town & amp;Country.Sure, a compact car and two crossover SUVs-one in the medium size, one of the full-size-are on their way, and can take the mark in a more mainstream direction depending on the price and content.

But I repeat that dodge models dermination, even if the price is considered affordable.

Overall, I love Fiat Chrysler's general plan to review the product portfolio.Having the focus of copper and jeep on the trucks and the SUVs only makes sense, make the SRT mark and drive those cars back into the Dodge brand.

Fiating a fiat on "urban" cars is a good step as well.

But the plan leaves the FCA without a typical full-line brand, La Chevy or Ford.Dodge is closest, but if you want a half-size sedan or minivan with a dodge badge, you're now lucky.You must buy Chrysler.If you want a compact, for sure, you can buy Dodge Dart, but for a "city car", you will be buying FIAT.

Of course, customers may not care, and most Chrysler merchants will be right next to the Dodge store anyway.But I feel there is a little crisis of identity here.Dodge is now the mainstream / performance brand while Chrysler is supposed to fill the other mainstream slots and would be a bit upscale?That's odd.

Would it be better for Dodge to be like chevy-mark with some performance models-and let Chrysler continue to be a "upscale" brand, which is how customers perceived it (at least before disastrous times under Cerberus Capital Management)?

Obviously Chrysler is hoping to face a larger range of buyers with this approach, and it is true that the brand has lost some luxury gloss in recent years, thanks to models like the Sebring / Last-Gen 200. But I feel that if Chrysler was positioned by Cadillac competitor, with a dodge intended to fight Ford and Chevy (as in the past), Fiat Chrysler has an even stronger message to bring his search to respect again.

translation.3:
How to talk to children about disabilities

Help your child get a better understanding of people with disabilities

From his teammates with a dyslexia to a cousin who uses a wheelchair, your child may be curious about people with disabilities.Talking to your child about disabilities can help him get a better understanding of why some people look, talk, act or walk a little different.

Provide education in a matter of facts

Do not try to convince your child that someone with disabilities is just like he is.

Instead, acknowledge that they are a little different, but it makes it clear that just because someone is different, it does not make that bad person.Then, show your children how to talk about those differences in a way that respects them.Give your child the language you use to talk about someone who has a learning or physical disability disability.

Educate your child about disabilities in a factor.Say things like, "the muscles in your uncle's feet do not work like yours. That's why he trouble walking," or "she was born with one leg. So she has a prosthetic leg that doctors made for her toShe uses to move ".

Try to keep your emotions from your conversation.If you say that someone's disability is "sad" or "terrible", your child may love the person, and that it won't be helpful.

Here are some important points to make:

Some people are born with disabilities.It makes it clear that sometimes, babies are born with disabilities.But at other times, people develop disabilities later in life.

People with disabilities are not sick.Explain that a child with a cerebral partside or muscular dystrophy is not sick.You don't want your child to think he can catch a disability.

There is nothing wrong with people with disabilities.Your child may ask questions like "What's wrong with that girl?"Explain that a child may have trouble talking or difficult to walk but that does not mean that there is something "bad" with her.

Physical disability does not mean that someone has a cognitive disability.Sometimes, kids assume someone with physical disabilities may also struggle to communicate or may not be smart.It makes it clear that just because someone's body does not work the same does not mean that their brain is impaired.

Explain how disabled people can use adaptive equipment

Talk to your baby about how disabled people can use adaptive equipment to assist them.Someone at the grocery store can have a service animal, and other people run by crutches or use a wheelchair to walk around.

You can also explain why there are parking spaces for people with physical disabilities located near the store.Explain how someone can use a special vehicle, designed to fit a wheelchair with a ramp or lift.

Educate your child how to best help someone using adaptive equipment.For example, make it clear that your child should never go to a dog who is wearing a vest of service unless the owner invites to do so, explaining how to have a door for someone who uses a wheelchair canIt makes it easier for them.

Emphasize like

Make sure you do not send the message that people with disabilities are completely different from everyone.

If someone speaks against him or refuses to hear, then he will stay with hels."A female giant refuses to feel bad for a bald, so it is attached to a hel for a little longer.

Goddess half-blooded

Jacob Grimm the theorizes that Hel, whom he called from the name Proto-German Halja, was, in fact, "half-goddess."Cannot be proven to be of full divine blood;In the case of HEL, Loki has improved the gigantess Angrboda.
translation.18:
Maltese athletes win six gold medals in Sicily

The Maltese athletes stole the scene in the third edition of the International Athletics Eap Meeting in Sicily held at the weekend in Catara, where they won no less than 14 medals, six of them gold.

The 28 Maltese athletes, the largest foreign contingent present, and coming from 10 local clubs, have not only achieved good results despite strong competition from Italian and international athletes, but also dominated in particular in medium and long distancesas well as in jumps.

In addition to winning medals, Maltese athletes have broken four competition records, three in the major category and EAP record in the under-18s.It was an experience that Jeremy Zammit (Pembroke Athleta) will still remember, when with a 7.14m jump he not only won a gold medal and earned a Maltese record under 18, but even found a place amongThe top ten jumps in the world for his age.

Monalisa Camilleri 1,500 meters female (4'42′43)

Graham Pellegrini (400 meters male) (49′99)

Athletics Malta President Andy Grech, who accompanied the Maltese team in Sicily, said: “Again local athletes have made us really proud.The results obtained in Kataria were more impressive with consideration that contrary to athletes from other countries, who could be trained normally in recent weeks, our athletes found themselves with stadiums and training facilities.Closed, and ended up being trained many times.These results confirm the potential of Maltese sport and send a message that it is time to make the sport a truly priority in our country ”.

Meanwhile, Pembroke Local Club Athleta has announced that it will be organizing an international EAP event in Malta on July 17 at Matthew Micallef St John Stadium in Marsa.This event is expected to attract a large number of foreign athletes to our shores through the different agreements that Athletics Malta has reached throughout the year.

A large property in the Bay in Birżebbuga has been around for almost forty years by the Labor Party, for a meager lease of € 1,164 per year.

A judicial letter was filed in the First Chamber of the Civil Court where Attorney Franco Grima and the family Ellul Sullivan are holding accountable for this failure to Attorney General, Government and Labor Party.

Forty years ago, this house, which was used as a hotel in the center of the beach, was taken with a requirement by the Housing Authority under the pretext that this building would be transformed into a telephone exchange and a jar.the health.Instead, however, this building, along with another corner home, were transformed into the local Labor Club.

Owners are saying that the miserable lease certainly does not reflect the value of this property, a lease that, due to a clause in Chapter 69 of the laws of Malta, cannot rise.The owners claim that this reminder is violating their rights, where not only have they been stolen from the use of property that is theirs, but also for the fact that there is a discrepancyGreat between their rights as owners and those of the occupant, which in this case is the Labor Party.

A judicial letter in the Constitutional Court is also expected to be presented in the coming days with the aim of restoring the property to the owners and paying the money owed to a family over the years.

Document 62009CJ0162

Judgment of the Court (Third Chamber) of 7 October 2010.#Secretary of State for Work and Pensions v Taou Lassal.#Reference for a Preliminary Ruling: Court of Appeal (England & Amp; Wales) (Civil Division) - United Kingdom.#Reference for Preliminary Ruling - Freedom of Movement for Persons - Directive 2004/38/EC - Article 16 - Right of Permanent Residence - Temporal Application - Periods Completed Before the date of Transposition.#Case C -162/09.

Judgment of the Court of Justice (Third Chamber) of 7 October 2010. Secretary of State for Work and Pensions vs Taou Lassal.Reference for a preliminary ruling: Court of Appeal (England & Amp; Wales) (Civil Division) - United Kingdom.Preliminary reference - Free movement of persons - Directive 2004/38/EC - Article 16 - Permanent right of residence - application in time - periods that came to an end before the date of transposition.Case C-162/09.

from the Court of Appeal (England & Amp; Wales) (Civil Division))

"Reference to a preliminary ruling-Free movement of persons-Directive 2004/38/EC-Article 16-Permanent Right of Residence-Application Ratione temporis-periods ended before the transposition date"

Summary of the sentence

-the periods of continuous residence of five years, which came to an end before the date of transposition of Directive 2004/38, ie 30 April 2006, according to the instruments of Union lawPrior to this date, account shall be taken for the purposes of obtaining the right of permanent residence in accordance with Article 16 (1) of this Directive, and

-absences from the host Member State, which are less than two consecutive years, which occurred before 30 April 2006 and after a continuous legal residence of five years that came to an end before that date, are not ofa nature affecting the acquisition of the right of permanent residence in accordance with Article 16 (1).

Certainly, obtaining a permanent right of residence due to a legal residence for a continuous period of five years in the territory of the host Member State, provided for in Article 16 (1) of Directive 2004/38, was not listed in-instruments of Union law, adopted for the application of Article 18 EC, before this Directive took place.However, an interpretation that only the periods of continuous legal residence of five years start to run from April 30, 2006 that should be taken into account for the purposes of obtaining this right of permanent residenceIt leads to such a right can only be granted from 30 April 2011. Such an interpretation will lead to the depriving of the residences ending by the citizens of the European Union in accordance with the instruments of European Union law before 30April 2006 from any effect for the purposes of achieving the said permanent right of residence, which is contrary to the purpose of Directive 2004/38 and deprives the latter of its useful effect.In addition, the interpretation stating that only the periods of continuous legal residence of five years have come to an end on April 30, 2006 or after that date to be taken into account, for the purposes of theAchieving the right of permanent residence provided for in Article 16 of Directive 2004/38, is also contrary to the purpose and useful effect of this Directive.In fact, the European Union legislature has subjected the acquisition of a permanent right of residence under Article 16 (1) of Directive 2004/38 for the integration of the citizen of the Union into the host Member State.However, it must be stated that it is incompatible with the idea of integration, which is the basis of Article 16 of this directive, which is considered that the obtained degree of integration in the host Member State depends on the pointabout whether the continuous five-year residence ended

translation.23:
Can the Minister give an account of the last convention for Maltese living abroad organized by his Ministry last April?What were the topics discussed?

Answer:

In the convention for the Maltese abroad held in April last year, around 120 participants and observers from the Maltese diaspora in Australia, Belgium, the United Arab Emirates, Luxembourg, theThe United States of America, the United Kingdom and other countries.Participants had the occasion to meet with the President of Malta the E.T.Marie Louise Coleiro Preca at St. Anthony's Palace.

The Convention was officially opened by the Prime Minister, the Hon.Dr.Joseph Muscat on April 21, 2015 at the Mediterranean Conference House, Valletta.Speeches were also made by me and the Leader of the Opposition.Two plenary and six workshops were held at the convention during which presentations on the Maltese identity, culture and language, the history of emigration and the future of the Maltese diaspora were presented.The first plenary was with the Maltese communities abroad-the current situation and the future 'and there were presentations on the situation of the Maltese in Australia, Brussels, the emigration from the lens of the lensEmigrant Commission as well as intercultural stereotypes and developments in Australia and Malta when Maltese emigrants return to Malta.After the first plenary the first workshop was held with a discussion on the same topic where the participants' regional experiences were given.Other studies were also presented, this time on the situation of the Maltese in Canada, the United Kingdom, and the Maltese of Egypt and Tripoli in Australia, the elderly in Australia, thethe importance of unions in the Maltese communities and some aspects of citizenship.The second workshop began with a presentation by the Youth Agency on the work done by this entity and continued with presentations on Maltese identity in Maltese youth in the states of Victoria and New South Wales in Australia, a perspective from Gozo as well as the work being done by Maltese youth in the United Kingdom.In the second plenary dealing with the theme 'The Council and the Maltese living abroad', the goals reached so far by the Council of Maltese living abroad, the difficulties and someImproved procedures.Finally, a presentation was made on the work carried out by the Directorate for Maltese living abroad.A presentation on Valletta 18 was also given after this plenary were the third and fourth workshops.The third workshop dealt with 'Communication with the Maltese Diaspora' and the fourth was about 'the new Maltese communities.'In the third workshop presentations were made on different ways with technology use how to improve communication with members of the Maltese diaspora around the world and on the various continents.In the fourth workshop presentations were made by members of the Diaspora in the Benelux countries and the United Arab Emirates, who have given their experience as recent communities.On the last day two other workshops were held, the fifth on 'identity', culture and maintenance of the Maltese language 'and the sixth on' the Maltese authors in the Diaspora. 'In the fifth workshop developments and problems related to the transformation of Maltese identity, culture, the role of religion, liberal developments in the diaspora as well as the teaching of the Maltese language were dealt with.In the various countries where there are schools and classes they carry out this work.During the sixth workshop, a group of Maltese writers in Diaspora discussed their experiences in transforming their identity as people living abroad and the Maltese identity they took from parents.All the work that includes the studies presented, as well as the rapporteurs reports, will be published in a book that is expected to be published soon.The convention was an important and successful exercise.I noticed in particular the enthusiastic participation of many Maltese young people living abroad.This augurs very well to continue the work started in the coming years with zeal and determination.During the days of the convention an exhibition was also held

translation.31:
Are you pregnant?

As you know, every woman has her own body.One may feel the beginning of pregnancy from the first day, and the other will not know its interesting position before the fetus moves.A woman waiting for a child may feel some indirect signs, and perhaps, in general, she does not feel something unusual.Therefore, each and every one, sooner or later, the question arises: how do I know if I am pregnant?

Signs of pregnancy

The first sign of pregnancy is the end of menstruation.However, menstruation may be lacking for other reasons, for example, with ovarian dysfunction.

Breast growth, nipple pigmentation can already be observed in the second week of pregnancy.The reason for this is a hormonal background change in a woman's body.

In pregnancy, a woman may have, the so-called, fake months: during the embryo attachment at a future age can bring pain in the lower abdomen and dangers.The same conditions can occur in pregnant women and on the days of menstruation expected on the fourth, eighth, twelve weeks.

An increase in urine is another sign of pregnancy after menstruation delays.Fetal egg attachment to the uterine wall is a signal for the body's production of a specific HCG hormone.During this period, the pregnancy test will show two strips.This event takes place, again, in each of us, at different times.

Early toxikosis can only be seen two days after conception.And you can get sick not only in the morning, but at any other time of the day.This nausea usually lasts until the second quarter.And some women may not feel this unpleasant disease.

Indirect signs of pregnancy are sudden mood changes in a woman, fatigue, excessive drowsiness, a change in taste.

As you can see, there are many signs of pregnancy, but if everything is for you, and afterwards they appear - everything is very individual.One of the simplest, but quite reliable ways to determine the onset of pregnancy is a pharmacy diagnostic test.In addition, you can use the base temperature measurement method.In the lab, it is possible to determine the onset of pregnancy using a special blood test taken from the vein.Also, most accurate, each of us can determine whether it is pregnant, as a rule, only when you visit a gynecologist.

Signs of false pregnancy in women

Today, cases of false pregnancy in women are not uncommon.And this psychophysiological state can be observed in girls, as well as mature women.A woman can really feel pregnant.

The fake pregnancy signs that this woman feels include the lack of menstruation, and nausea, increased abdomen and mammary glands.Sometimes this "false pregnant woman" may also feel the movements of the fetus.

A woman who performed the pregnancy test in this state probably gives a false result.However, in the first reception in the gynecologist with the help of a modern the fact of the lack of pregnancy is easily established.

In the risk group for false pregnancy, women are likely to be prone and hypochondric, which had a strong mental or emotional shock.They can be girls, panic afraid of unwanted pregnancy, or mature ladies who may not conceive a child for a long time.Maybe this woman in the past had dead babies or injuries.

If the woman's doctors have established a false pregnancy, she needs, in addition to visiting the gynecologist, also the supervision of the therapist.
translation.32:
Rule rule for standard deviation

Standard deviation and range are both measures to disseminate a data set.Each number tells us in the way data is spaced, as both are a measure of variation.Although there is no explicit relationship between the range and standard deviation, there is a general rule that may be useful for relating these two statistics.This relationship is sometimes referred to as the range of the range for standard deviation.

The range of the range tells us that the standard sample deviation is approximately equal to a quarter of the data range.In other words S = (maximum - minimum) / 4. This is a very simple formula for use, and should only be used as a rough estimate of standard deviation.

Example

To see an example of how the rule of the range works, we will look at the following example.Suppose we start with the data values of 12, 12, 14, 15, 16, 18, 18, 20, 20, 25. These values have an average of 17 and a standard deviation of about 4.1.If instead we first calculate our data range as 25-12 = 13, and then share this number with four we have our standard deviation estimate as 13/4 = 3.25.This number is relatively close to the true standard deviation and good for a rough estimate.

Why work?

It may seem that the rule of range is slightly strange.Why work?Does it seem completely arbitrary to simply divide the range with four?

Why not distribute with a different number?In fact there is some math justification going on behind scenes.

It recalls the properties of the bell curve and the probabilities from a normal standard distribution.One feature has to do with the amount of data that falls within a certain number of standard deviations:

About 68% of the data is within one standard deviation (higher or less) than the average.

About 95% of the data is in two standard (higher or lower) deviations than the average.

About 99% is in three standard (higher or lower) deviations than average.

The number we will use has to do with 95%.We can say that 95% of two standard under average deviations for two standard deviations above average, we have 95% of our data.Therefore almost our normal distribution should spread to a line segment that is a total of four long standard deviations.

Not all data are usually broken down and bell bell shaped but most data are enough to go two standard deviations away from the average catches almost all data.We estimate and say that four standard deviations are approximately the size of the range, so the four-range divided is a approximate approximation of the standard deviation.

Uses for the Rule Rule

The range of the range is helpful in a number of settings.First, it is a very quick estimate of the standard deviation.The standard deviation requires you to first find the average, then reduce this medium from each data point, square the differences, add them, share with less than the number of data points, then (finally)

On the other hand, the range of the range requires only one reduction and one division.

Other places where the range of range is helpful is when we have incomplete information.Formulas like the one to determine the size of the sample require three pieces of information: the desired error margin, the level of confidence and the standard deviation of the population we are able to style.It is often impossible to know what the standard population deviation is.With the range of range, we can estimate these statistics, and then we know how great we should make our sample.

There are three cleaning rules:

Visit the doctor to determine the contraindications.

Each cleaning starts with the intestines, then performs a liver cleaning, and then cleanses the kidneys.Do not change the sequence-it can damage your body.

Start cleaning immediately after the full moon, then it passes easier.This time it is considered best to start any business that involves getting rid of something, in particular, from post-winter slag and illness.

How to clean the intestines?

The most inocious way to get rid of dirt is enema.For enema we use boiled water, add lemon juice or apple cider vinegar to 2 liters of 1 tablespoon water.These substances can maintain the necessary environment in the gut.In addition, citric acid is a potent antioxidant, and apple cider vinegar is an antiseptic.

The water in the enema should be at room temperature.You cannot take hot water for the enema, as hot water quickly dissolves stagnant stools in itself and therefore does not remove, but is absorbed by the mucous membrane and enters the bloodstream and causes poisoning.

The best time for the procedure is the period from 5 to 7 am, because during this time the intestine functions more actively.The most effective active is the knee.After the enema is injected into the gut, hanging for 3-4 minutes on the right side so that the water can pass into an ascending part of the large intestine, then add on one side, whilePut on the right-we last for a few minutes so that the water can department-for the hunt.Then you need to stand in the creating "birch" and "breathing" in the belly.The duration of the entire procedure will be 10 minutes, then rise and perform defecation.

The entire course of enema treatment is 14 days.The first week of enema we do every day, starting the second week, we do it every day.Gradually, the result should be achieved-the introduction of two liters into the gut at a time.If it does not work, then the intestines have not yet been fully approved.In the future, we clean the bowels once a week for a year.

The liver begins to clean after 2-3 weeks of intestinal cleaning.In addition, before starting cleaning the liver, it is worth noting fatty foods and meat.And three days before the commencement of purification, one should be hungry.In these three days we drink 2-3 liters a day of freshly prepared apple juice.The procedure itself takes place in the evening from 19 hours.

What is spermatogenesis?Definition, periods

In the body of women and men, the process of ripening sexual cells is continuous.And if with the ladies everything in this regard is quite understandable, then men remain a mystery.It is unlikely that someone away from medicine is seriously thinking about what spermatogenesis is.But to have a general idea to be good for broadening the general knowledge and a better understanding of own physiology.

Definition

To start this improvised digression in biology and stology is better than the theoretical base.So, what is spermatogenesis?This is the process, the final product of which is spermatozoa.All its stages are controlled by hormones and nervous system.

Each cycle lasts about ninety days.This is three times more than that of women, but the number of sex cells also rises many more orders.In each hour of these 90 days in the testes, one hundred million active sperm ripen.The most comfortable temperature for this process is 34-35 degrees Celsius.

Spermagenesis can be conditionally divided into three phases, or period:

- proliferation;- Meiosis;- spermiogenesis.

Period

What is spermatogenesis?It is a sequential process that has stages and stages.Biologists distinguish four types of tissue changes:

All this happens in the seminiferous tubes located inside the testicles.The outer layer of the cells that make up the walls of the tubes is spermogonia.They constantly divide mitotically.This process begins before the birth of the baby and lasts up to twenty-five years.Cells are divided so intensely that this time period is called the reproduction period.

After the beginning of puberty, spermatogonia is divided into two groups:

- those who continue to share;-those moving to the center of the tube, in the growing area.

In a new place, the cells grow in size, have a nutrient-rich cytoplasm.From spermatogonia they move on to first-order spermatocytes.In this period of spermatogenesis, from each spermatocyte, two girls cells are formed, and spermids are already obtained from them.

Then the spermids are uniformly distributed during the testicle, Inforrah from the inside.And over time they gradually ripen for sperm, falling into the vas deferens, and then in the urethra.

Proliferation

On the main membrane of seminiferous tubes is spermatogonia, the number of which at the time of puberty can reach a billion.According to their morphological characteristics, they are divided:

Dark spermatogon is a reserve, they are in an inert state until they need (after a serious illness or radiation).The lightweight cells are continuously divided, creating both type A and B cells.

As a result of spermatogenesis in the embryonic period and from the moment of birth to 14 years, a significant collection of cells accumulating in sperm accumulated in men.This provides them with a longer period of fertility than for women (only 300 eggs, and do not share).

Meiosis: spermatogenesis

Spermatogonia, related to type B cells, is first divided several times by mitosis and transformed into first-order permatocyte.This cell, in turn, is also divided, but not equal, but meiosis.At the end of the first stage, two daughter cells are formed-second-order spermatocytes, each containing a set of chromosomes.The second stage is completed by obtaining two expert from each spermatocyte.

In total, four new cells are obtained from one.Each of them has a haploid set of chromosomes and in the future can participate in egg fertilization.

Spermiogenesis

The difference between spermagenesis and ogenesis is that in the final phase there should be as many small cells containing genetic information as much as possible, not only one, but a large and full of nutrients.
