text.76:
2 τάσεις που φοράει σχεδόν καθημερινά μια από τις πιο γνωστές influencers 

Ωστόσο υπάρχουν κάποια κομμάτια που αγαπάει ιδιαίτερα και δεν τα αποχωρίζεται εύκολα από την γκαρνταρόμπα της. 

Η Danielle έχει μεγάλη αδυναμία στις ολόσωμες φόρμες και μάλιστα η ίδια έχει δημιουργήσει πολλές φορές δικές της σειρές με ολόσωμες φόρμες και playsuits. Στη νέα της κολεξιόν υπάρχουν καλοκαιρινά κομμάτια που θα εντυπωσιάζουν, όπως η ριγέ ολόσωμη φόρμα που θα δεις στη φωτογραφία παρακάτω. 

Η ίδια συνδυάζει την ολόσωμη φόρμα της με μπαντάνα στα μαλλιά και γυαλιά ηλίου και κλέβει τις εντυπώσεις. 

Η γνωστή influencer έχει αδυναμία και στα σακάκια και στην ντουλάπα της υπάρχουν αμέτρητα σχέδια και χρώματα από τα συγκεκριμένα πανωφόρια. Η ίδια τα φοράει με τζιν παντελόνια, με cargo pants, αλλά και με φόρμες, κολάν και biker shorts. Oι συνδυασμοί που κάνει είναι άπειροι και η ίδια συνήθως προτιμάει τις πιο φαρδιές γραμμές που φοριούνται πιο εύκολα στην καθημερινότητά μας.
text.77:
Πληροφορίες και Τηλεφωνικές Παραγγελίες 

Ο π. Μάρκος γεννήθηκε στην Αθήνα την 19η Αυγούστου του έτους 1937, ανήμερα της Μεταμορφώσεως του Κυρίου (π. ημερ). Με το νέο ημερολόγιο η Εκκλησία μας τιμά την μνήμη των Αγίων Μαρτύρων Ανδρέου του Στρατηλάτου και των συν αυτώ δισχιλίων πεντακοσίων ενενήκοντα τριών και τον Όσιο Θεοφάνη, πολιούχο της Ναούσης (16ος αιών). Τον Όσιο Θεοφάνη ευλαβείτο πολύ και τιμούσε ιδιαίτερα. Ο πατέρας του Κωνσταντίνος γεννήθηκε στο χωριό Κονιάκος Δωρίδος. Ήταν ο πρωτότοκος υιός του Χαραλάμπους και της Μαρίας Μανώλη. Οι γονείς του εκοιμήθησαν πολύ νέοι και τον μεγάλωσε η ευλαβής γιαγιά του από την μητέρα του, Βασιλική Κουμπάρου. Νεώτατος δημιούργησε μία μικρή γαλακτοκομική επιχείρηση. Ήταν πιστός, ευλαβής, δίκαιος και πολύ ελεήμων. Η μητέρα του Ελένη, ή πρωτότοκη κόρη του Κωνσταντίνου και της Μαρίας Κοτρώνη, γεννήθηκε στο χωριό Κάτω Μουσουνίτσα Δωρίδος και η μητέρα της εκοιμήθη, όταν ήταν σε μικρή ηλικία. Ήταν έξυπνη, εργατική, συνετή και είχε ανατραφή με την πατροπαράδοτη πίστη των ευλαβών ρουμελιωτών προγόνων της. Είχε ανεπτυγμένη την αρετή της ελεημοσύνης και βοηθούσε πολύ τους πάσχοντες και τους πτωχούς. Στο ιερό μυστήριο της Βαπτίσεώς του, που έγινε την 5η Ιουνίου του έτους 1938 στον Ιερό Ναό Αγίας Σοφίας Κάτω Πετραλώνων, έλαβε το όνομα του παππού του, Χαράλαμπος. Έλαβε όμως και τα χαρίσματα του Αγίου Πνεύματος: "Πνεύμα σοφίας, πνεύμα συνέσεως, πνεύμα φόβου Θεού". Ευλαβείτο πολύ τον Άγιο Χαράλαμπο. Από μικρό παιδάκι τον συγκινούσε πολύ ο βίος του και ιδιαίτερα το μαρτύριό του. Όταν μεγάλωσε και διηγείτο τον βίο του αγίου Χαραλάμπους στα μικρότερα παιδιά, το πρόσωπό του έλαμπε και η προτροπή του ήταν να μοιάσουμε και εμείς στον άγιο Χαράλαμπο. [...]

text.80: Άκορος Υδροχαρές φυτό, ιθαγενές της Ευρώπης. Η λέξη Acorus έχει σχέση με την ελληνική λέξη κόρη (οφθαλμού), λόγω της χρήσεως του φυτού για τις παθήσεις των οφθαλμών. Ο Πλίνιος γράφει ότι φυτρώνει στη περιοχή της Μαύρης Θάλασσας και τον 13ο αιώνα η χρήση του είναι γνωστή στη Πολωνία, όπου φαίνεται ότι το έφεραν οι Τάταροι. Αργότερα έγινε γνωστό και στην υπόλοιπη Ευρώπη. Στην Ελλάδα το φυτό αναπτύσσεται σε τέλματα , έλη ή όχθες ποταμών. Είναι πολυετές, έχει ύψος 0,5-1 μ., τα φύλλα του είναι μακριά, σπαθοειδή και τα άνθη μικρά, δυσδιάκριτα, κιτρινωπά και εμφανίζονται κατά το τέλος της άνοιξης και τις αρχές του καλοκαιριού. Καλλιεργείται πολλές φορές για το ωραίο φύλλωμά του, σαν διακοσμητικό, κυρίως όμως για το σαρκώδες, πικρό και αρωματικό ρίζωμά του, που χρησιμοποιείται στην αρωματοποιΐα, την ποτοποιΐα και ιδιαίτερα στη φαρμακευτική, σαν φάρμακο χωνευτικό, διουρητικό και τονωτικό του οργανισμού. Η συγκομιδή του ριζώματος γίνεται την άνοιξη ή το φθινόπωρο, Μετά τη συγκομιδή το ρο ρίζωμα ξεραίνεται.

text.82:
Γεννήθηκε το 1952 στο Κάιρο της Αιγύπτου. Το 1969 έφυγε για σπουδές στην Ιταλία. Πήρε το πτυχίο της Αρχιτεκτονικής Σχολής του Πανεπιστημίου Ρώμης το 1978. Εργάστηκε στην Αθήνα ως αρχιτέκτονας μέχρι το 1982. Την ίδια περίοδο αρχίζει να μεταφράζει από την ιταλική γλώσσα, στην αρχή δοκίμια και στη συνέχεια λογοτεχνικά έργα. Το 1983 ξεκίνησε ως δημοσιογράφος στο περιοδικό "Ένα". Στη συνέχεια εργάστηκε ως διευθυντής σε διάφορα περιοδικά μαζικής κυκλοφορίας. Η δημοσιογραφική του ενασχόληση συνεχίζεται μέχρι σήμερα στην εφημερίδα "Αυγή", στην οποία υπογράφει κάθε Κυριακή μια ολόκληρη σελίδα με τον τίτλο "Περιδιαβάζοντας". Από το 1998 εργάζεται ως Διευθυντής του τμήματος Ξένης Λογοτεχνίας στις Εκδόσεις Καστανιώτη. Από το 2000 διδάσκει σε μεταπτυχιακά τμήματα του Πανεπιστημίου Αθηνών καθώς και στο ΕΚΕΜΕΛ πρακτική μετάφρασης. 

Κρατικό Βραβείο Ξένης Λογοτεχνικής Μετάφρασης (2003) για τη μετάφραση του βιβλίου του Αντόνιο Ταμπούκι "Είναι αργά, όλο και πιο αργά". 

Ιππότης Εργασίας του Ιταλικού Κράτους (2004), για τις προσπάθειές του στην εξάπλωση της ιταλικής κουλτούρας. 

Μεταφράσεις 

Umberto Cerroni, Κρίση του Μαρξισμού. Αθήνα, Θεμέλιο, 1979, σελ. 136. 

Antonio Tabucchi, Οι τρείς τελευταίες μέρες του Φερνάντο Πεσσόα. Ένα παραλήρημα. Αθήνα, Άγρα, 1999, σελ. 93. 

Italo Calvino, Λίγο πριν πεις εμπρός. Αθήνα, Καστανιώτης, 1999, σελ. 361.

text.84:
Ο απόλυτος οδηγός για το μάρκετινγκ B2B το 2022 [+ Νέα δεδομένα] 

Το αποτελεσματικό μάρκετινγκ είναι δύσκολο να γίνει σωστό. Μεταξύ δημιουργικών απαιτήσεων, ορίων προϋπολογισμού και αποφάσεων καναλιού, οι έμποροι έχουν πολλά να κάνουν ζογκλέρ κατά την ανάπτυξη της στρατηγικής μάρκετινγκ. 

Ο μεγαλύτερος καθοριστικός παράγοντας του αποτελεσματικού μάρκετινγκ, ωστόσο, είναι ο δικός σας ακροατήριο. 

Εάν δεν στοχεύετε σωστά αγοραστή, οι προσφορές και οι διαφημίσεις σας πιθανότατα θα πέσουν στο κενό. Μπορεί επίσης να μην κάνετε καθόλου μάρκετινγκ. 

Όπου το κοινό-στόχος διαφέρει περισσότερο, ωστόσο, είναι μεταξύ μεμονωμένοι καταναλωτές και επιχειρήσεις. Ορισμένες εταιρείες εξυπηρετούν μεμονωμένους αγοραστές, ενώ άλλες εξυπηρετούν εταιρείες και οργανισμούς. 

Το μάρκετινγκ σε επιχειρήσεις είναι πολύ διαφορετικό από το μάρκετινγκ έως τους μεμονωμένους καταναλωτές. Γι' αυτό υπάρχει μια εντελώς διαφορετική μέθοδος μάρκετινγκ – B2B μάρκετινγκ – και γι' αυτό δημιουργήσαμε αυτόν τον οδηγό. 

Μέχρι το τέλος αυτού του άρθρου, θα έχετε καλύτερη κατανόηση του μάρκετινγκ B2B, των πιο αποτελεσματικών στρατηγικών μάρκετινγκ B2B και του τρόπου με τον οποίο μπορείτε να αξιοποιήσετε και να μετατρέψετε το κοινό της επιχείρησής σας. Επιπλέον, οι τάσεις που μπορείτε να περιμένετε στον χώρο B2B το 2023, σύμφωνα με νέα έρευνα και συμβουλές από ειδικούς. 

Τι είναι το B2B Marketing; 

Το μάρκετινγκ B2B (business-to-business) αναφέρεται σε οποιαδήποτε στρατηγική μάρκετινγκ ή περιεχόμενο που απευθύνεται σε μια επιχείρηση ή οργανισμό. Οι εταιρείες που πωλούν προϊόντα ή υπηρεσίες σε άλλες επιχειρήσεις ή οργανισμούς (έναντι καταναλωτών) χρησιμοποιούν συνήθως στρατηγικές μάρκετινγκ B2B. 

Ο σκοπός του μάρκετινγκ B2B είναι να εξοικειώσει άλλες επιχειρήσεις με το εμπορικό σήμα σας, την αξία του προϊόντος ή της υπηρεσίας σας και να τις μετατρέψει σε πελάτες. 

Το HubSpot είναι ένα παράδειγμα μιας εταιρείας που ασχολείται με το μάρκετινγκ B2B. Οι πελάτες του HubSpot είναι άλλες επιχειρήσεις, όχι μεμονωμένοι καταναλωτές. Επομένως, όλες οι προσπάθειες μάρκετινγκ μπορούν να ταξινομηθούν ως B2B. 

B2B μάρκετινγκ στοχεύει τις ανάγκες, τα ενδιαφέροντα και τις προκλήσεις των ατόμων που πραγματοποιούν αγορές για λογαριασμό ή για τον οργανισμό τους (και όχι για τον εαυτό τους), κάνοντας έτσι επιχειρήσεις ο πελάτης. 

Ακολουθούν μερικά παραδείγματα εταιρειών B2B: 

Ένας συνεργατικός χώρος που μισθώνει χώρους γραφείων σε απομακρυσμένες ομάδες και ελεύθερους επαγγελματίες (όπως Χώροι) 

Μια υπηρεσία παραγγελίας κατά παραγγελία, αποθήκευση και οθόνη εκτύπωσης (όπως Εκτυπώσιμη) 

Μια εταιρεία λογισμικού μάρκετινγκ που πουλά εργαλεία διαχείρισης κοινωνικών μέσων, λογισμικό παραγωγής μολύβδου και άλλα εργαλεία μάρκετινγκ σε επιχειρήσεις και οργανισμούς (όπως HubSpot!) 

B2C μάρκετινγκ στοχεύει τις ανάγκες, τα ενδιαφέροντα και τις προκλήσεις των μεμονωμένων καταναλωτών που πραγματοποιούν αγορές για λογαριασμό τους ή για τους ίδιους, πραγματοποιώντας έτσι ατομικές ο πελάτης. Ακολουθούν μερικά παραδείγματα εταιρειών B2C: 

Μια εταιρεία ηλεκτρονικού εμπορίου που πουλά είδη γραφείου σε απομακρυσμένα ή αυτοαπασχολούμενα άτομα (όπως Πόπιν) 

Ένα κατάστημα που πουλάει μπλουζάκια και άλλα ρούχα και αξεσουάρ (όπως στόχος) 

Μια πλατφόρμα μουσικής που πουλά συνδρομές συνεχούς ροής (όπως Spotify) 

Ρίξτε μια ματιά σε αυτό το γράφημα συγκρίνοντας πελάτες B2B και B2C. 

για μάρκετινγκ b2b 

για μάρκετινγκ b2c 

Στόχος 

Οι πελάτες επικεντρώνονται στην απόδοση επένδυσης (ROI), στην αποδοτικότητα και στην τεχνογνωσία. 

Οι πελάτες αναζητούν προσφορές και ψυχαγωγία (που σημαίνει ότι το μάρκετινγκ πρέπει να είναι περισσότερο διασκέδαση). 

Κίνητρα αγοράς 

Οι πελάτες οδηγούνται από λογική και οικονομικά κίνητρα. 

Οι πελάτες οδηγούνται από συναίσθημα.
text.85:
Φυσικό αέριο: Πιθανόν εντός της ημέρας το ρωσικό σχέδιο για πληρωμές σε ρούβλια– Όλα τα σενάρια 

Ενδεχομένως και μέσα στην ημέρα θα δώσει το Κρεμλίνο την πρότασή του για τις πληρωμές του φυσικού αερίου σε ρούβλια, η οποία θα ισχύει για τη Γερμανία αλλά και όλες τις "μη φιλικές" χώρες. Μία από τις εκδοχές φαίνεται να προβλέπει έναν διαμεσολαβητικό ρόλο της Gazprom Bank, η οποία θα δέχεται τις πληρωμές σε ευρώ ή δολάρια και θα μετατρέπει τα χρήματα αυτά σε ρούβλια εσωτερικά, στη Ρωσία, όπως δήλωσε και ο Ιταλός πρωθυπουργός Μάριο Ντράγκι. Ο Ρώσος πρόεδρος Βλαντίμιρ Πούτιν είπε κατ' επανάληψη τις τελευταίες ημέρες ότι οι "μη φιλικές" χώρες προς τη Ρωσία θα πρέπει να πληρώνουν για το φυσικό αέριο με ρούβλια, αντί για δολάρια ή ευρώ. Πάντως, η Μόσχα έκανε πίσω από την απαίτησή της οι πληρωμές σε ρούβλια να γίνονται από σήμερα, απομακρύνοντας έστω και για την ώρα τον κίνδυνο σοβαρής διατάραξης των προμηθειών στην Ευρώπη. Υπενθυμίζεται ότι ο Πούτιν είχε ζητήσει από την κρατική εταιρεία φυσικού αερίου Gazprom, την κεντρική τράπεζα και την κυβέρνηση να δώσουν οδηγίες για την εφαρμογή της νέας πολιτικής από σήμερα, Πέμπτη. Οι μεγάλες οικονομίες του G7 απέρριψαν την απαίτηση της Ρωσίας για αλλαγή του νομίσματος. Ο ρόλος της Gazprom Bank Ωστόσο, σε επαφές που είχε με τον Γερμανό καγκελάριο Όλαφ Σολτς την Τετάρτη, ο Πούτιν είπε ότι οι ευρωπαϊκές εταιρείες μπορούν να συνεχίσουν να πληρώνουν με ευρώ ή δολάρια. Τα χρήματα θα πληρώνονται στην Gazprom Bank και θα μεταφέρονται σε ρούβλια στη Ρωσία, όπως μετέδωσε η Deutsche Welle. Σύμφωνα με τις ίδιες πληροφορίες, ο Σολτς δεν συμφώνησε στη διαδικασία αυτή, αλλά ζήτησε τις οδηγίες γραπτώς για να κατανοήσει καλύτερα την πρόταση. Έκτοτε, φαίνεται να έχουν γίνει περαιτέρω επαφές των δύο πλευρών σε επίπεδο οικονομικών συμβούλων. Ο Μάριο Ντράγκι δήλωσε ότι από την επικοινωνία που είχε με τον Πούτιν κατάλαβε ότι η μετατροπή των δολαρίων και των ευρώ σε ρούβλια θα γίνεται εσωτερικά στη Ρωσία. Τα υφιστάμενα συμβόλαια συνεχίζουν να ισχύουν και οι ευρωπαϊκές εταιρείες θα συνεχίσουν να πληρώνουν σε ευρώ και δολάρια, του είπε ο Πούτιν, πρόσθεσε ο Ντράγκι. Σύμφωνα με τις πληροφορίες του Reuters, το προτεινόμενο σχέδιο προβλέπει ότι η Gazprom Bank θα παίζει τον ρόλο του διαμεσολαβητή για τις συναλλαγές των αγοραστών με την Gazprom. Οι πληρωμές θα γίνονται στο νόμισμα που προβλέπει το συμβόλαιο (π.χ. ευρώ), στην επίσημη ισοτιμία ρουβλίου/ευρώ που δίνει η κεντρική τράπεζα της Ρωσίας την ημέρα αυτή. Το Κρεμλίνο ισχυρίζεται ότι η αλλαγή του νομίσματος είναι αναγκαία, λόγω του γεγονότος ότι οι ευρωπαϊκές χώρες έχουν "παγώσει" τα συναλλαγματικά αποθεματικά της Τράπεζας της Ρωσίας. Πάντως χθες, ο εκπρόσωπος του Κρεμλίνου Ντμίτρι Πεσκόφ επιβεβαίωσε ότι η Ρωσία δεν θα απαιτήσει άμεσα στις πληρωμές σε ρούβλια, καθώς αυτή είναι πιθανότατα μία "σταδιακή διαδικασία". Σύμφωνα με τις τελευταίες πληροφορίες, το Κρεμλίνο δεν έχει πάρει τις τελικές αποφάσεις, όμως σκέφτεται να επεκτείνει το σχέδιό του για πληρωμές σε ρούβλια και σε άλλα εμπορεύματα, όπως το πετρέλαιο, τα σιτηρά, τα λιπάσματα, ο άνθρακας και τα μέταλλα. Η Γερμανία, όπως και το G7 επιμένουν ότι οι συμφωνίες για το αέριο δεν μπορούν να αναθεωρηθούν μονομερώς. Πάντως,

where: {Phone} = Incoming phone without gaps and special characters.

The Panathinaikos basketball is right this year to do what he should have done two years ago.

It was Obradovic's last year in Panathinaikos.Of course we didn't know then that it was the last, but he obviously knew it.Indeed, the agreement for that last year of collaboration with the team went through long -lasting appointments, budget disagreements and various other issues, as we had learned from the report.Then, after a thousand waves and a lot of suffering, "Zots" agreed to stay for a year, even with a reduced budget.But just because it was only for a year, he also made a disposable team.If you remember, the Panathinaikos roster that year was full of "tired lad".Yasikevitsius, Batist, Tsartsaris, Diamantidis were some of the most compassionate.And in the summer "shopping", no younger and talented players were selected, with prospects, but players ready to go in and play if needed.At a time when Olympiacos e.g.He was taking Mantzari, Panathinaikos was taking the nearly 30 -year -old Kiritsi.While Olympiacos already had Papanikolaou, Slouka, Katsiveli, Panathinaikos went and took Pat Kalathis.It is no coincidence that all those kids are still in Olympiacos, improve every year, have a role and have or will have a place in the National, when there is no Kiritsis or Pat Kalathis in Panathinaikos this year.We said, "Zots" probably knew that he would stay strictly for a year and had neither the timeframe nor the willingness to "create" a new dough and make yeast for the next day of the team.That disposable team made by Obradovic may not have won the championship or Euroleague - both Ivkovic's Olympian - but a shot from the Euroleague final, a shot that was not made after the ball was left in his hands.In the last attack of the semifinals with CSKA and reached the fifth final of A1.The "old men" fought it, but they did not succeed in the details.And when Obradovic left, the chaos stayed behind him as he closed a circle not only for the coaching team, but also for most players who found good money elsewhere and chose to live the adventure in the foreigners and not in the OAKA, starting again.Beginning, with a new coach and an uncertain future.I do not know who was justified and who not of what happened to Panathinaikos and the teams that the former Panathinaikos players went.Nick Kalathis, for example, went for a joy to Kuban - and he and his team - but for Batist, Vougioukas, Kaimakoglou, and even "Saras" things may not go as they had imagined.And now Panathinaikos, having a dowry for this year's double and the momentum that this team acquired through the work of Pedoulakis and his associates, became an attractive destination for Greek and foreign players, again a big favorite for A1 and A1
translation.3:
Calculus torture me elder to give up the fight

April 5, 2016

- You remind me of what you are saying, something that happened some time ago to a friend of a farmer, the spiritual said.Come on, sit here near, tell you my little story.

The young man always listened to the cute narratives of the good old man.

- My friend, you say, had a field on the edge of the village, which had been uncultivated for years and was now full of thorns and trivolia.But a good year, he thought of sowing it.But it had to be cleaned first.So he sent his big one to do this job.But as the lad saw the huge thorns and the savages, he fell into despair.

So he convinced himself for good that it was impossible to do the job.He was lying under a bush and slept.As he woke up it was noon.He threw his sleepy gaze into the wild and scared.He remained nailed to his place until the night without doing anything.The same day, and on the third ......... he was yelling, twisting lazy, falling asleep, wake up.Only his father did not decide to do, as he went and saw that his son did not take a single thorn.

- My soul is heavy, the young man confessed, as I turn around and I see how much work is waiting for me and I can't make a decision to start.

- If every day, my child, you cleaned as much land as you catch with your boyfriend, as you lie down and sleep, you would now end.

translation.8:
Renault Clio R.S.It got a Trophy version, with a power increased to 220 hp, a faster gearbox and sporty suspension settings.

To date the Renault Clio R.S.200 EDC has not been able to excite testers and audiences to the same degree as its predecessor.With the new version of R.S.220 EDC Trophy, this may change.

The Trophy name translates mainly into increased power and more sporty settings for the double clutch gearbox and suspension.More specifically, on the 1,600 -horsepower engine of the Clio R.S.200 EDC has been installed a larger turbo, in combination with redesigned import and exhaust systems.Thus the power has increased to 220 PS (from 200) and the torque to 26.5 kgm (from 24.5), while exclusively with the 4th and 5th ratio the latter is increased to 28.6 kgm with overboost.The speed cutter is now at 6,800 rpm, instead of 6,500.

The 6 -inch EDC dual -clutch transmission has received interventions to achieve up to 50% faster changes, while the paddles routes on the steering wheel has been reduced by 30% for greater immediacy.Still, the operation of the Sport program has been revised, and both on it and the RACE automatically disables the STOP & AMP; Start system.Renault has not announced the performance that Trophy achieves, but revealed that it emits less CO2: 138 g/km, instead of 144. So in Greece it will pay significantly less traffic fees and release freely on the green ring.

The new springs bring the Trophy body closer to the asphalt, 20 mm at the front and 10 mm on the rear.They are naturally combined with new shock absorbers, while the immediacy of road behavior also contributes to the faster cremile, with a reason of 13.2: 1 instead of 14.5: 1.The tires are Michelin Pilot Super Sport 205/40R18, and are worn on the wheels we know from the existing Cup package, but here they have a different finish.The Trophy logo is available in the front bumper and in the interior, and only this version is available in the color combination of Frozen White: White matte body with black glossy roof.

Inside, the difference is made by leather and heated sports seats with the built -in headrest.They are part of a package that will be charged extra to some markets, along with the carbon fiber finish in the air ducts, on the base of gear lever and in the doors.However, the R.S.Monitor is charged extra even in Trophy.

Although the Renault Clio R.S.220 EDC Trophy is considered a limited production model, and will have a serial number in the internal sink, the French company has not announced how much will be produced.However, its sales in European markets will begin next June.

Alexis Galanopoulos

Cannabis may beat pain from nervous system diseases

The researchers published the details of their studies in the newspaper of the Canadian Medical Association.

They initially used 23 people, but wish to broaden the research to even more.Under medical monitoring, the patients in a dose of 25 mg, three times a day for 5 consecutive days, followed by 9 days without use.The circles were repeated four times.

According to the researchers, patients' symptoms were relieved.The team leader, Dr.Mark Ware notes that this is the first clinical trumpet test in external patients ever reported.

About 1 to 2 percent of people suffer from neuropathic pain, but pharmaceutical treatment does not relieve them.

British doctors see research as an "encouraging step forward", noting the need for larger studies that will give more valid results.

Civil Servants - Transfers - Proposal of the Competent Authority - The Minister's Competent Authority - in the absence of any letter of the Minister, proving that he made the decision, the letter sent by an Officer to the EDY, as a proposal to him as a proposal.Minister, violated the essential press and was unpaid.

The appeal offended the decision of it, suggested, among other things, that the proposal of the competent authority, that is, the Minister was not taken by himself but by a ministry official.

The plenary of the Supreme Court, allowing the appeal by a majority, by decision of Judge Kallis, agreed by the judges of Artemis and Nikolaou, decided that:

In the realm of administrative law, the responsibility for submitting a proposal by the official responsible for transferring an official is called advisory or advisory jurisdiction.

The submission of a proposal by the competent authority, for the transfer of an employee, is a preparatory action and because it is provided by law it is a "type of administrative act".(See Papachatzis) p. 616.

The decision to transfer an employee belongs to the EDY.But this must be in line with the proposal.EDYIt has a discretion to either issue a decision to relocate in accordance with the proposal of the competent authority, or not to issue any decision.

The wording of the proposal may be manifested either at the initiative of the instrument it proposes or on the initiative of the body that decides.In the case, the law lays the initiative to submit the proposal to the competent authority.

The provisions of Article 48 (2) of the Law are taken into account.At the court judgment, what is of primary importance is not the identity of the person or body that signs the proposal for transfer and the letter that transmit the proposal, but the identity of the person or instrument that has taken the decision to submit a reasoned proposal forTransposition of an employee.The responsibility for making such a decision belongs, in accordance with the explicit checks of Article 48 (2) of the law to the competent authority - to the Minister, who usually acts through the Director General of the Ministry.

In this case there is no record of a registered decision of the competent authority - the Minister or the General Manager - on the transfer of the appeal.Nor is any decision of the Minister or General Manager registered in which the reasons for dictate the transfer is recorded.It is emphasized that the jurisdiction in relation to this aspect of the procedure - reasons that dictate the transfer - belongs to the competent authority because Article 48 (2) of the Law speaks for a proposal by the competent authority properly reasoned.

It has been borne that the administrative bodies must keep written registrations (Written records) of their decisions.This is imposed by the principles of good administration.

In the absence of written registration confirming that the decision to relocate has been taken by the body to which the law has laid down the relevant competence is considered to be the presumption of the regularity of administrative acts, it does not have the range of the cloak of legality what they need.to take place to legally carry out one.The opposite approach would be equivalent to circumventing the principles of good administration that dictate compliance

Christmas has always been the celebration of love, kindness and offer.Around the world, rhythms, houses and roads are changed, carols from beautiful children's voices are heard, exquisite Christmas sweets fragrances the atmosphere.

Christians with respect celebrate the birth of God.Santa Claus comes on the first day of the year to share his gifts by giving children happiness.

As throughout Greece, there are separate festive Christmas events in Skopelos.Most celebrations are clearly concerned with children, if during the Christmas season everyone reveals the child hiding inside them.At Christmas in Skopelos the residents celebrate with joy.

CHRISTMAS TRADITIONS

In Greece and in Skopelos the Christmas season begins on December 6th, it is the day that Saint Nicholas (or otherwise the Saint of the Navy) is celebrated.The informal end of Christmas holidays is January 7, this is the day that Saint John is celebrating.

Christmas in Skopelos, in all houses and all neighborhoods are flooded with wonderful Christmas fragrances, ornaments and gifts.In all ovens, pastry shops and all grocery stores, preparations are made at a strong pace.At Christmas in Skopelos everyone is preparing traditional Christmas delicacies on the island.

Tree ornament - Karaviou

As all over the world Christmas, Christmas in Skopelos adorn Christmas trees with countless ornaments, lights, Christmas balls and handmade constructions.

The tradition of decorating a boat in Greek houses is widespread.This custom was much more intense in the old days in Greece.When the children with excess of love, indisputation and intense creativity were trying and making the creation of the boats on their own.

The construction was improvised with what materials existed in every home.

In the old days there were many more sailors.So the boat also includes a tribute to the Greek sailors and the anxiety of relatives for quick reward.

Apart from the navy that was intense in Skopelos and all over Greece the boat has another symbolism.It essentially urges us for a new cruise in our lives at the beginning of the new year and always based on the birth of Christ.

CHRISTMAS - New Year's Eve

translation.28:
Hair Syndrome

You may bathe regularly and yet notice that your hair soon starts to smell bad.

In this case you may have hair smell syndrome.

It is a rare case that it does not have with how clean the hair is.

What is hair smell syndrome?

It is characterized by odors, very unpleasant to the person himself and for those around him.

Hair easily absorbs odors from the outside environment, as well as the skin, but to a greater extent.

Hair and scalp smell badly more easily.

They accumulate sebum and sweat, which favors the growth of yeast, dead cells and bacteria.

Sweat itself has no smell but the bacteria have, which feed on the lipids and sweat proteins.

They release bad odors, as the skull sweats like the rest of the body.

Hair smells worse because they keep the skull warm and this heat helps bacteria to grow more easily.

Having ruled out the possibility of any hormonal imbalance, the best way to deal with is regular hair bathing, and even twice a day if it is necessary with a gentle shampoo for everyday use that will clean them in depth without dehydrating them.

As with the skin, if you use a product that is very astringent, it can cause excessive sebum production.

In any case, you should avoid using a softener near the roots of your hair.

This will aggravate grease and thus the smell.

There are several theories about the causes of this syndrome.

Causes of the syndrome

According to one theory, there is a sebaceous gland associated with each pocket and produces sebum.

The fats the hair is, the more prone to environmental pollutants, such as tobacco, the smells of cooking and other strong odors that make them smell bad.

The scalp of the head, in addition to the sebaceous, also has the sweat glands.

As regardless of the deodorant one uses, it can be more prone to sweating and smell of the body than someone else.

So the skin of the head in some people is more prone to grease and smell.

A fairly thick hair absorbs a lot of sebum.

But people with thinner hair can find that sebum and so the smell can be more than just a problem.

Also someone who uses many styling products makes his hair more prone to attract more odors from the environment and trap them in the hair.

The amount of sebum produced in the scalp is adjusted by part of the androgens.

Intense psychological pressure and stress can change the levels of adrenal gland in one organism.

This can have a multiplier effect on androgen levels.

So it leads to excessive production of sebum and most likely to smell the hair.

Cut the carrots into slices and toss in the blender, along with 3 pieces of pineapple.Alternatively, we can rub them in the grater.We prefer the canned pineapple because it's not hard like fresh pineapple.Also the canned syrup gives it an extra sweetness.Pour the pineapple with the carrots into a bowl and mix.Add the rest of the ingredients: grated hazelnuts, a dose of vanilla, 2 tbsp.Baking Powder, cinnamon and grated coconut.Light the oven to 170 degrees to prefix.

Divide the eggs into yolks and egg whites.We cook the yolks in a Ben Marie.That is, we rest a stainless steel bowl on a boiling saucepan and pour in the yolks and sugar.Stir constantly until a whitish thick cream is made to make the mixture.Then pour it into the bowl with the carrots and mix with the rest of the ingredients.Beat the egg whites in the mixer to make a fluffy meringue.Pour the meringue into the bowl and mix gently so that it does not lose its air.The meringue gives the air the cake needs to become fluffy.

In the meantime we make homemade glaze: In a bowl, pour the cream cheese and gradually stir add the powdered sugar.Pour the lemon zest and the flower and continue to stir.When the mixture is homogenized it is ready.

When we remove the cake after the oven, let it cool and spread the glaze with a spatula.Place it in the fridge for 30 minutes to stand and it is ready!

Asofontylite, Monument to Amorgian Agricultural Architecture

The once lively agricultural facility, intact from the newer effects, seals everywhere with its simple aesthetics: in the threshing floor and in the wells, in the ovens and in the interior design of the houses (location of the fireplace, built beds, etc.), on the stone -built roadthat crosses.

... Stone as structural material is difficult to distinguish from the natural surroundings, forming a complex in its simplicity of folk traditional architecture

At some point, to the right and left of the road, the traveler will notice a peculiar, carved paintings on the rocks.About 100 years ago he was designed by the hand of a handicapped child, but his soul and senses were maintained and the firmness of the barren and desert landscape was strengthened!Paintings that lead associates in ancient times, sealed by rare rock paintings.

At the heart of the interest lies the church of St. Nicholas, a separate architectural note, a white rough touch on the gray motif of Petra.A downhill, rough trail, leads east of the settlement in Halara, a virgin coast to NE, with a significant source.

Asofontylitis is a place of protocycladic, important in historical times, since relics of Hellenistic tower have been found in the area.

[Box type = "shadow"] 1885 - J.TH.Bent "The mountain village, where we had lunch, brought the long name Asofontylite. It is a cheese village and consists of Hamps.This village the old men wear an ancient costume, consisting of a strange vest or bodice and red hats, a knitted cover hanging beneath a side, made by their wives at home spinning the material and dying it with one kindberry found on the hills. "

In Asfondylitis, who was also the center for those close to him, dismissed before him settlements, halara, root, columns and Xirokabi lived permanently until the first of the 1950s, several families and their members usually retired on the first Sunday.Every month, when the Pope came from the river, to the function he made to Agios Nikolaos.

Unknown for more reason, in Asfodylitis the institution of the kingdom, where the king was the grandfather of Michalis Artemis, Michalis and the Vice -Rector, was the king of Roussetos.The kings were accompanied by a guard led by Nikolas Dimitriou and members of other men in the settlement.Of course, the responsibilities of the king were also confined to the territory of Asfodylis, but whatever the case was, it was an important principle for the place and probably had a say in many of the functions of the small society it reigned.

Perhaps the "power" was imposed by Elder Michalis, who went to reign in heaven in 1957 because of his term in the palace guard; he was not only from this fact but also from his physical strength.The king was a man two meters tall and had great power, so much that he was attributed to the placement of the large lintel in the residences of the settlement.He had once brought to the settlement and a engraving of Russian tsar Nicholas with the woman

translation.35:
Meatballs in the oven

Ingredients for 5 servings 1 kg of pork minced meat 1 large onion 1 egg white 1 small bunch of parsley 1 slice of stale bread 2-3 leaflets mint 1 tbsp lemon 1 tablespoon of evaporated milk 1 tbsp olive oil oregano.Chop the parsley and mint.Remove from bread the crust and soak in water for 2-3 minutes.Press it by hand to drain the water and rub it on crumbs.In a deep bowl mix the minced meat with the onion, bread, parsley, mint, lemon, milk, oregano and egg whites.Pour the ingredients very well and sprinkle with small, flat meatballs.Put it in the oven with 1 cup of water at 220 degrees, and bake for 15-20 minutes.

translation.38:
Do you want to lose weight?This is the diet you have to follow !!!

Harley Pasternak!If you have never heard him recommend him!She is the Hollywood Women's Personal Trainer - such as Megan Fox, Kim Kardashian, Hilary Duff and Jessica Simpson.

Recently he fell into my hands his new book "The Body Reset Diet" explaining his view that when we want to lose weight we must not be in a gym day after trying.

Characteristically he comments that there is no quantity and no type of exercise that can repair for a poor nutrition.

Harley Pasternak explains his diet, which consists of 3 phases and each phase lasts 5 days.It is a full antioxidant diet that will make you lose weight quickly, in a healthy way, without the use of lipotropic, thermogenic, diuretic and other chemicals and above all without starving!

The phases of the diet

Phase 1: For 5 consecutive days we beat in the blender a huge white smoothie in the morning (yogurt and sour milk, ie banana or pineapple), a red at noon (with plenty of berries, bilberries and/or strawberries) and an equally huge green in the evening (with green vegetables of our choice).This is how we get all the proteins, good fats and fiber we need and in greater quantity than if we did everything juice.

Phase 2: For the next 5 days we replace one of the 3 smoothies with a light meal such as soup, salad, or sandwiches.

Phase 3: In the next 5 days we replace another of the smoothies with a regular meal.

Among the 3 main phases of the phases, Harley Pasternak suggests healthy snacks (10, afternoon) such as air poped pop corn, hummus, raw vegetables and more.

From gymnastics, all we recommend is to take 10,000 steps a day (in a nutshell go almost everywhere walking).Of course, information says that in the book, there is some exercise for phases 2 and 3.

Smoothies should be made with vegetables, fruits and nuts.As Pasternak says: a meal is not a meal and a snack is not a snack if there is no proteins and fiber.

Recipes for smoothies:

(All have yogurt and sour milk base)

Pina Colada Smoothie (white smoothie)

1 cleaned orange 1/3 of the mug of coconut milk 1 scoop clean whey protein 1 banana 1 cup pieces pineapple all together in the blender until they are homogenized as you want.

Red Berry Smoothie (red smoothie)

1 mug of bilberry 1⁄4 cup raspberry 1⁄2 orange cleaned 1 scoop pure whey protein 1 tbsp linseed all together in the blender until they are homogenized as you like.

Green with Envy Smoothie (Green Smoothie)

2 cups spinach 15 green or red grapes 1 ripe pear cut but not peeled 2 tablespoons of avocado 1-2 tablespoons of freshly squeezed lime juice all together in the blender until they are as homogenized as you like.

+Smoothie bonus

2 cups cut frozen strawberries 1 frozen banana Komeni 2 teaspoons of sweet peanut 3/4 cup yogurt without fat 1/2 cup ice cubes

translation.39:
As today: In 1071 the Battle of Mantzikert: The beginning of the end of the Byzantine Empire

On August 26, 1071, the Byzantines have been defeated by the Seljuk Turks in Mantzikert, near Lake Van, causing their control to Asia Minor.Many distinguished historians (Anna Komninis, Steven Ransiman, Julius Norwich) argue that this defeat notes the beginning of the end of Byzantine domination in the East and the gradual Turkishization of Asia Minor.

The city of Mantzikert (today's Turkey Malazgirt) was a stable target of the conquering aspirations of the various enemies of the empire, especially the Seljuk Turks in the 11th century.Its strategic position on the defense of the empire was reinforced by its excellent fortification and its honorable guard.

The Seljuk Turks, who were named after their guardian Seljuk, had come from the steppes of today's Turkestan and taking advantage of the decline of the Arabs, took their place in history and together with the baton of Islam.The Byzantine Empire was also in a phase of decline, plagued by internal disputes, malice and major financial problems.

Their attempt to occupy the city during the reign of Constantine III of Mammace (1042-1054) was repelled by the vigorous resistance of the guard.The Seljuk Turks were forced to solve the siege with great losses, but did not resign from the target.The Sultan of Alp-Arslan, after repeated military successes, succeeded in occupying the powerful fortresses of Aniou and after constant efforts by the Mantzikert Fortress (1070), thereby gaining control in the wider area.

Emperor Romanos II Diogenes (1068-1071) took over an organized campaign against the Seljuk Turks on the third in a row, in 1071. Head of a multinational mercenary army, consisting of Byzantines, Franks, IberiansArmenians, etc., re-seized Manjikert, during the absence of Alp-Arslan, which besiege Edessa of Mesopotamia (today's Urfa Turkey).When he learned that the Byzantines had again taken Mantzikert, he rejected the emperor's peace proposals and marched against him.Approaching the Byzantine army he presented his own peace proposals, which were rejected by Romanos.

The decisive battle between the two armies was fought on August 26, 1071 near Mantzikert.Romanos lined up from 40,000 to 70,000 men, with their generals Nikiforos Vrienne, Theodore Alyatis and Andronicus Doukas and Alp-Arslan from 20,000 to 30,000 men.

The Byzantines, despite their superiority in live material, suffered a dire defeat on the battlefield, mainly due to the internal contradictions of their generals and the discipline of the army.It is noteworthy that almost half their army, which was mercenary, either did not take part in the battle or self -camp.On the part of the Byzantines, the Turkish mercenaries and the Scandinavian Varangs, who constituted Emperor Romanos' bodyguard, were distinguished in the battle, but who did not prevent his captivity as they fell up to one.

Romanos was injured before the ALP - Arslan, who behaved well, and was forced to accept the terms of the treaty that dictated him: Providing annual taxes and military aid, liberalization of all Muslim prisoners and border arrangements.

Year of issue: 2001

ISBN: 978-960-14-0484-4

Pages: 242

Figure: 28x29

The album "The Other Greece" contains 250 photos of 180 areas of the country, photographed by 24 different photographers.Most of the areas of Greece presented here are not classic travel destinations and as visitors to these areas we may need to renounce the easy solutions and amenities of mass tourism to discover them.The album aims to introduce us to the variety and uniqueness of the Greek landscape.The journey begins in Evros, Prespa, continues in central Greece, the Aegean, the Ionian Sea, the Peloponnese and ends in Crete.It is not a tourist guide and therefore not the exact position of the images presented and it does not aspire to present a complete recording of all areas of the country - the venture impossible in the context of a album.On the contrary, it aims to spark our interest to discover these images, to get to know the uniqueness of Greece that will be revealed to us as long as we want it.This was also the motivation of the people who made this version, the photographers.They are amateur photographers, contemporary explorers of Greek nature, who have devoted many years of their lives to recording it and efforts to protect it.

The Young Masters Ensemble Orchestra in Kifissia

The Association "The Friends of the Kifissia Orchestra" has the honor to host at the Kifissia Town Hall on Tuesday, August 8, 2017 at: 20:30 the "Young Masters Ensemble" orchestra, a musical set of 15 new musicians from Vienna in their firstShow in Greece.

Fifteen participants form the Young Masters Ensemle, a room orchestra that always plays without a maestro and in which musicians play successive solo.

The "Young Masters" program for talented young musicians is an initiative of the University of Music and Performing Arts in Vienna and the J. S. Bach Evangelical Music School, also in Vienna.

The orchestra traveled to America shortly before visiting Greece for the first time this year and continued its musical walks in Asia in 2018.

In Vienna, the orchestra has played in large halls such as Musikverein's Golden Hall and Schubert Saal, at charity events such as Kiwanis, Lions Club and many festivals.

This important musical event is due to the efforts of internationally acclaimed Kifissiotis pianist Christos Marantou, who works in Vienna and managed to bring the "Young Masters Program" to Greece this year.

The purpose of this program, prepared by the University of Vienna Music and Performing Arts and the Evangelical Music School "J.S.Bach Musikschule Wien" taught by Christos Marantos, is to support new musicians through projects, seminars and concerts along the waythem to a successful artistic career.

The result of "Young Masters Program" is the orchestra consisting of 15 new talented musicians between the age of 15 and 19, which will perform this summer a skillfully demanding classical project program in a series of concerts in highly selected venues and festivals across Greece.

It is of particular importance that the venture - this tour in Greece - takes place this year, a milestone for the University of Music and the Vienna Performing Arts, which is celebrating 200 years since its founding, as well as for the Evangelical Church which celebrates 500Years of religious reform, as a big thank you from the two Austrian institutions - through the timeless value of classical music - in Greece, a cradle of European culture.

Following is the concert in Agria Volos on August 5, and then the orchestra will play in Thassos, Ancient Messina, Piraeus, Kifissia and at the Gyzi Graz Festival in Santorini.

We would like to thank the President of the NPD.Culture and Sport of the Municipality of Kifissia Achilleas Kourepi, as well as the employees of this body for their immediate valuable response and support for the realization of this important venture, the partnership of Greece and Austria.

translation.60:
FSHD: MANOEUVRE CLINICAL TEST

Roche announced the launch of the Manoeuvre clinical trial, a Phase 2 clinical trial aimed at evaluating pharmacodynamics, safety, tolerance, pharmacokinetics and efficacy of Gym329 (RO7204239), an experimental antibody anti -mockery against myostatin antibody.Increase in people suffering from a face-ooma-bearing muscle dystrophy (FSHD).

At present, there are no approved treatments, on the contrary there are increased needs of people living with the disease.This study is in response to the need to evaluate new therapeutic options for FSHD and innovative ways of improving muscle function and motor capabilities necessary for everyday life.

GYM329 is a research antibody over myostatin aimed at skeletal muscles, potentially increasing their size and growth.Myostatin plays an important role in regulating skeletal muscle size by controlling their growth.Suspension of its action can help muscle growth in size and empowerment.

GYM329 is designed as a "recycling" antibody, which means it can be more effective in removing myostatin from blood compared to a conventional antibody.

The Manoeuvre clinical trial will evaluate the pharmacodynamics, tolerance, pharmacokinetics, safety and efficacy of GYM329 in walking persons (people who can walk independently), aged 18-65 years with FSHD1 or FSHD2.The study is expected to enroll 48 participants.

This is a study that will be checked for a placebo drug that will be given subcutaneously to participants who meet either GYM329 or placebo every four weeks.The study will be double blind which means that both the participant and the study group will not know who receives GYM329 and who the placebo.During the study, participants will be asked to undergo various evaluations such as magnetic resonance imaging (MRI), trials of muscle function and strength, to complete questionnaires as well as other evaluations.At the beginning of the study and then every six months, participants will be asked to wear a digital device for a 4 -week period to record daily and lower -end movement as well as changes in daily routine activities.

The study will be completed when all participants have completed 52 weeks of treatment and will have the option of continuing the treatment for another 52 weeks, during which all participants receive GYM329.The results will determine whether the study will continue in Phase 3.

10 centers have been selected in four countries: Denmark, Italy, the United Kingdom and the United States.The registration period is expected to begin by the end of 2022. Anyone interested in participating in the study should discuss the treatment options with their treating physician.For further information on the manoeuvre study you can find at clinicaltrials.gov.

translation.63:
Blog / Digital Marketing

Search algorithms: What is and how they work

What are searches algorithms?

Search algorithms are a unique type of algorithm used by search engines to recover specific information stored in a data structure.Aim to determine the importance of a website based on its content.Search algorithms are unique to the search engine and determine the ranking of websites in the search results.

Common types of search algorithms

Search engines use specific algorithms based on the size and structure of their data to be able to return a result.

Linear search algorithm

Linear search algorithms are considered the most basic of all search algorithms as they require a minimum code for their application.They are also known as 'successive search' and is the simplest type for using search algorithms.They are used for short lists that are not classified and their elements are mixed.To find what you are looking for the algorithm examines the details as a list.When it reaches the searched item, the search is completed.Linear algorithm is not a common way of searching as it is relatively ineffective compared to others available.

Binary search algorithm

The binary search algorithm, unlike the linear search algorithms, takes advantage of the order of a list.It is the best option when lists have terms that appear in a row of increasing size.This algorithm starts in the middle of the list.If the goal is to find a lower price than the middle point, then it eliminates the upper half of the list.If the goal is to find a higher value than the middle element, then it eliminates the lower half of the list.This is constantly done as the binary search uses a loop or a retrospective to divide the search area by half after each comparison.For larger databases, binary search algorithms produce faster results than linear algorithms.

How do search algorithms affect SEO Optimization

Search algorithms affect the classification of a website in search results.Each search engine uses a specific set of rules to determine if a page is real or spam and whether its content and data are interested in the user.The results of this process are those that will determine the classification of a website.

While each set of rules as well as the types of algorithms vary, search engines use some common factors to determine the ranking.

Web page ranking and searches, factors affecting

Web relativity

Search engines are looking for the content and text of each website, searching for keywords as well as their position within it.If the keywords are in the title of the page, in the heading or first sentences on the page of a site, then this page will be better classified for this keyword than others.Of course there are too many actions that need to be taken, not only.Search engines can scan to see how the keywords are used to determine if the page is relevant to what you are looking for.Also the frequency of keywords affects the relevance of a

Let's face it.We become lazy or we are very busy to really read the nutritional information in the products we buy.The fact is that the media mislead us and we only have half truths about foods advertised as "healthy".

Companies leave some room for interpretation for the ever -increasing threat of lawsuit by an unhappy customer.Let's take a quick look at some of the foods you always thought was healthy, but it really isn't.

1. fruit juices

Certainly 100% of fruit juices cannot be unhealthy.The juice comes from natural fruits, you just don't have the whole surface of the fruit or the whole pulp when you are done.There is the problem.

Fruits are healthy for you and provide you with plenty of minerals and vitamins that your body really needs.But what also has plenty of fruit is sugar.In its natural form it is not a problem because the fruit has fiber that prevent the body from quickly digesting sugar.Remove the fibers and you have sugar that your body cannot really use so quickly and turns into fat.

2. Ready Trade salads

I don't even want to know how many people have been fooled by the salad they buy in the stores.These small packets of leafy deception can quite pack the number of calories.The problem is not the salad itself, but rather in the sauce or add -on materials.They do it to give the salad a little more taste.

Some of these salads can have up to 600 calories and have enough sugar.Rather stay and consume homemade good things.

3. Diet or no sugar products

For those of us who have a few pounds more, it is really enticing to go for low or fat products.The question to ask yourself is how food companies really made the product have less fat in the first place.

A recent study in the United Kingdom showed that these foods can have up to 10% more calories and 40% of the initials.Once you have to add artificial fragrances and pigments, the red lights on your head will erase.This means that the fragrance was removed with fat and that other sweeteners should be added.

4. Dried fruits

Another fruity fake substitute is the nuts.These sweet delicacies are sweet for a very good reason.When your dried fruit loses, it loses the water and a large amount of taste.To deal with this, sugar is added to restore the taste.

5. Granola

One may believe that Granola is the perfect companion for your yogurt and healthy fruit salad in the morning.The truth is that a 1⁄4 cup size size may have been loaded with sugar, calories and carbohydrates.You may not even have enough fiber.But not all Granola brands are the same.

Some brands leave the healthy place to add flavor while other brands really produce a healthy (though less

translation.80: Aquatic aquatic plant, native to Europe.The word Acorus is related to the Greek word daughter (eye) because of the use of the plant for eye diseases.Pliny writes that it grows in the Black Sea region and in the 13th century its use is known in Poland, where the Tatars appear to have brought it.Later it became known in the rest of Europe.In Greece, the plant grows in labeys, swamps or rivers.It is perennial, it is 0.5-1 m high. Its leaves are long, spathoids and the flowers small, indistinct, yellowish and appear at the end of spring and early summer.It is often cultivated for its fine foliage, as a decorative, but mainly for its fleshy, bitter and aromatic rhizome, used in perfumery, distillery and especially in medicinal, as a medicinal, diuretic and tonic of the body.The root harvest takes place in spring or autumn, after harvest the rhizome dries.

translation.84:
The ultimate driver for B2B Marketing in 2022 [+ New Data]

Effective marketing is difficult to do right.Between creative requirements, budgetary borders and channel decisions, traders have a lot to do in the development of marketing strategy.

The biggest decisive factor in effective marketing, however, is your own audience.

If you are not targeting a buyer properly, your bids and ads will probably fall into the void.You may also not make any marketing at all.

Where the target audience is more different, however, it is among individual consumers and businesses.Some companies serve individual buyers, while others serve companies and organizations.

Business marketing is very different from marketing to individual consumers.That is why there is a completely different method of marketing - B2B Marketing - and so we created this guide.

By the end of this article, you will have a better understanding of B2B marketing, the most effective B2B marketing strategies and the way you can use and convert your business audience.In addition, the trends you can expect in the B2B site in 2023, according to new research and tips from experts.

What is B2B Marketing?

The B2B (Business-To-Business) marketing refers to any marketing strategy or content aimed at a business or organization.Companies that sell products or services to other businesses or organizations (against consumers) usually use B2B marketing strategies.

The purpose of B2B Marketing is to familiarize other businesses with your brand, the value of your product or service and to convert them to customers.

Hubspot is an example of a B2B marketing company.Hubspot customers are other businesses, not individual consumers.Therefore, all marketing attempts can be classified as B2B.

B2B Marketing aims for the needs, interests and challenges of people who make purchases on behalf of or for their body (and not for themselves), thus making businesses by the customer.

Here are some examples of B2B companies:

A collaborative space that hires office spaces in remote groups and freelancers (such as spaces)

An order service on order, storage and print display (as printable)

A marketing software company selling social media management tools, lead software and other marketing tools in businesses and organizations (such as hubspot!)

B2C Marketing aims for the needs, interests and challenges of individual consumers who make purchases on their behalf or for themselves, thus making the customer individually.Here are some examples of B2C companies:

An e -commerce company selling office items in remote or self -employed person

A store selling t -shirts and other clothes and accessories (such as target)

A music platform that sells continuous flow subscriptions (such as Spotify)

Take a look at this chart by comparing B2B and B2C customers.

For B2B marketing

For B2C marketing

Target

Customers are focused on investing (ROI), efficiency and know -how.

Customers are looking for offers and entertainment (which means that marketing should be more fun).

Market incentives

Customers are driven by logical and financial incentives.

Customers are driven by emotion.
